K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:266b-15: gling bzhi pa gnyis pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:266b-17: tshangs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:266b-18: de bzhin du gling bzhi pa gsum pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:266b-20: lnga pa'i bar dag gi brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:266b-25: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:266b-26: bdud dang; tshangs pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir de dag 'khor dang bcas te gling bzhi pa 'dir lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-0: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi @267a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-1: stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bar dag nas kyang brgya byin ther 'bum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-2: lha'i bu rab 'thab bral ther 'bum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-3: yongs su dga' ldan ther 'bum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-6: lha ma yin gyi dbang po ther 'bum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-8: tshangs pa chen po ther 'bum dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus tshangs pa chen po'i bar du re re zhing yang tshangs ris kyi lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bar dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-13: bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa 'dir lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-14: de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag kyang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa phyogs de ni cung zad kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-16: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-17: gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdag gir ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267a-18: ji ltar rnam thos kyi bu ther 'bum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267b-0: tshangs pa chen po thar 'bum gyi bar 'di @267b dag bdag dang mthun par 'jug pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang bdag dang mthun par mdzad pa lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267b-1: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267b-4: sems can dmyal ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rab tu zhi bar mdzad la bde ba'i tshor ba bskyed nas de dag re re'i mdun na'ang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa bzhugs shing des sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mdzad par gyur cig snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rab tu gdung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267b-7: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin rab tu gdung ba la thugs mnyam par bzhag pas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed dag byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:267b-8: 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-0: de la 'od zer kha cig ni sems can dmyal bar dong @268a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-1: nas grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams la rlung dron po dag langs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-2: gang dag tsha ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag la ni rlung bsil ba dag langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-3: des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-5: ngal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas nas bde ba'i tshor ba bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-6: sems can dmyal ba pa re re'i mdun na'ang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs legs par spras pa bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-7: de nas sems can dmyal ba pa bde ba dang ldan pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-8: rkyen gang gis bdag cag gi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi zhing bde ba skyes par gyur snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-9: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa de mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-10: de dag gis de mthong nas 'di skad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid chen po 'di'i mthus bdag cag 'di ltar bde bar gyur to zhes zer zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268a-11: de dag dga' ba dang bde ba skyes nas rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-0: @268b bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-2: khyed cag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes legs par tshig tu brjod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-3: khyed cag phyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag tu bde ba'i tshor ba 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-4: de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces bdag cag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag cag gi las kyi sgrib pa zad par gyur cig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-6: de nas kha cig shi 'phos nas kyang mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-7: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gang dag mes bsreg pa de dag la'ang 'od zer de dag gis rlung bsil bdag rab tu btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-8: de dag gis de la reg pa dang bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-9: skom pa rab tu zhi zhing sdug bsngal med par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-10: kha cig de nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes pa'i bar du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-11: de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams la'ang brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-12: de bzhin du mi rnams kyi bar la'ang brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:268b-13: 'od de yang phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu @269a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-5: lha ma yin bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-6: sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-9: dzambu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-10: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched kyi phyir lha rnams kyis rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer yid 'ong 'dzin gyi dzambu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal lha'i rgyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-11: lhab lhub dag gis brgyan to zhes thos nas bdag cag dong ste blta zhing der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-12: dge slong gi dge 'dun yang blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-13: der song nas bcom ldan 'das las chos kyang mnyan par bya'o zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-14: de'i tshe na mi rnams las skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-17: bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-18: dge slong gi dge 'dun la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269a-22: skyed mos tshal de'ang mthong bar 'dod pa'i phyir nyin gcig bzhin du grong khyer yid 'ong 'dzin du 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269b-0: skyed mos tshal de @269b la'ang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgo nyi khri yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269b-1: skyed mos tshal gyi sgo re re zhing rin po che'i khri'u lnga brgya lnga brgya pa shams nas de dag la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya lnga brgya 'khod nas sems can gang dag 'ongs shing skyed mos tshal der 'jug pa de dag bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269b-2: chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269b-3: 'dzud cing sems kyang bskyed du 'jug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269b-4: gang dag nye ba na gnas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269b-5: gang dag ring ba na gnas pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:269b-7: dge slong gi dge 'dun yang blta ba'i phyir phyis skyed mos tshal der 'jug go ;de ltar mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lo bdun po de dag las lha bgrang ba las 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-0: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i bar dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par @270a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-1: 'dzin du bcug ste btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-2: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de lo bdun po de dag 'das nas kyang lha'i 'khor lo rin po che ma gtogs par 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-3: glang po rin po che ma gtogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyi brgyan pa'i glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-4: shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dag kyang 'bul bar 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-5: rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyang lo bdun po de dag 'das 'das su 'dod chags la 'dun pa ma skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-12: zas la 'dun pa med; skom la 'dun pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-18: gzhan du 'dun pa med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-19: lo bdun du glos phab ste nyal bar ma gyur kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-20: de la mtshan mo'i 'du shes ma skyes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-21: nyin mo'i 'du shes ma skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270a-26: reg bya'i 'du shes kyang ma skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270b-0: lo bdun du de dag gis lus la ngal ba ma @270b skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270b-1: rtag par rgyun du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong yang de'i mig lam du ri rab snang bar ma gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270b-2: ri gzhan dag kyang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270b-4: khor yug chen po dag kyang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270b-5: 'jig rten gyi bar dag kyang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270b-6: nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270b-7: lha'i gzhal med khang dag kyang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur cing ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag mthong ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa dag la lta zhing smon lam sems par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:270b-8: ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud de lta bu'i bde ba'i yon tan gyi gnas pas lo bdun du gnas pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:276b-2: 'tsho zhing gzhen la chos kyang ston pa rnams rtag tu mthong bar gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:277a-1: bdag ni de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing don du gnyer ba lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:277a-3: bdag ni ji srid du de lta bu'i yon tan dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma bgyis pa de srid byang chub sems dpar gyur cing dka' ba spyod par bgyid lags so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:277a-9: bdag gis 'od ni tshad ma mchis shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag snang bar bgyid par gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:290a-12: grangs ma mchis pa dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed mthong bar dag las nyan thos dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:292a-1: snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:292a-7: sems can de dag byang chub cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing der dbang po rnams ma tshang bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:292a-8: de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag la blta bar 'tshal ba de dag gang dang gang du mchi ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:292b-0: mthong nas kyang gang @292b dag chos la the tshom du gyur pa des mthong ma thag tu de dang bral bar gyur nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:292b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gcig kyang skra ring zhing gos dkar po 'tshal bar mi 'gyur la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:292b-13: khyod kyis ni smon lam shin tu bzang por btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-0: rigs kyi bu khyod ni shin tu yon tan dang ldan zhing shin tu ye shes dang ldan pas ni gang gi phyir @293a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-1: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rab mchog gi blo gros bkra shis par byas zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rab mchog yong su bzung bas de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal zhes bya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-3: 'jam dpal khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+g'a'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das nas grangs med pa gsum pa la bab pa na lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa rdul bral yang dag bsags zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-4: der 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyang 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de lta bu'i yon tan bkod pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-6: 'jam dpal khyod ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-8: khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kyang de lta bur yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293a-9: khyod byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na ji ltar smon lam btab pa ltar khyod kyi smon lam de dag thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293b-0: de bas na khyod ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed @293b par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293b-2: de'i phyir khyod ni sems can rnams kyi sman lta bur 'gyur zhing bsam pa yongs su sbyong bar byed par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293b-3: nyon mongs pa yongs su 'joms par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:293b-4: dge ba'i phyogs rnam par 'phel bar byed par yang 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:300b-7: gang dang gang du mchis sam ldog pa'i phyogs thams cad dus dag kyang mthong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:300b-8: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos rnams la nam nur dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-2: de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhing bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-3: de dag gis ting nge 'dzin nyi ma'i sgrol ma thob par gyur nas gti mug spangs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-4: de dag 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-9: khyod kyis ni smon lam bzang po btab po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-12: gal te bdag smon lam de ltar bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rang kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu tsandan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char rab tu 'bab par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-13: sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-14: bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin gya nom snang zhes bgyi ba thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-15: de'ang bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:304b-17: des ting nge 'dzin gya no ma snang ba bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305a-0: snags rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu tsandan sbrul @305a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305a-1: gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char bab pa de'ang bdag nyid kyis mthong la phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa gang dag gi thal mo sbyar te byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag kyang mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305a-4: shin tu myur bar spos kyi char yab bab la sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305a-6: de'i phyir khyod seng ge sbos zhes bya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305a-7: seng ge spos khyod ni bskal ba grangs med pa gang+g'a'i klung gcig gi bye ba nyed 'das nas grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas snga rgyas kyi zhing gangg'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das pa der 'jig rten gyi khams dri sngo snang ba rdul bral zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305a-8: seng ge spos khyod ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba rdul bral spos mtho dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-0: de nas @305b byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i spos kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag ldan phyag byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying bos de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-2: lha mi lha min rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba longs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-3: srid pa'i 'gro bar sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyi sgrol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-4: srid pa'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'ching ba khyod kyis chod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-5: mi yi rgyal ba 'phags pa'i gang zag nyid du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-7: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu brgyad pa gnod pa med ces bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-9: bdag ni ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can khri sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri sdo snang ba rdul bral ci 'dra par gyur pa de ltar yongs su dag par 'god par 'gyur zhing de de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-10: bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-11: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab par gnas par 'gyur pa srid du byang chub sems dpar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:305b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na slad kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306a-1: nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mi spyod pa de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306a-3: gang gi tshe bdag lo bdun po 'di la gcig pu dben par mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan yongs su dag pa la sems shing mchis pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306a-6: bdag gis ting nge 'dzin snang ba bkod pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin khri chig stong bskyed cing thob ste bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306a-8: bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos ston pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306a-10: gang dag dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bgyi ba rgyal ba rnams kyis yongs su gtams pa de dag mthong zhing der 'jug par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-0: ting nge 'dzin des bdag @306b gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-1: nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-2: ting nge 'dzin kyi mthus bdag gnas ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lus kyis re re la'ang phyag 'tshal bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-3: re re la'ang bdag gi lus re res rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-4: me tog sna tshogs bla na ma mchis pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-9: rol mo'i sgra bla na ma mchis pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-10: bkod pa bla na ma mchis pa thams cad kyis mchod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu'ang bdag bskal ba rgya mtsho bye ba snyed du spyod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-12: gang gi tshe bdag gis lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi re re'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 'tshal bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:306b-14: ting nge 'dzin yon tan 'byung gnas kyis de dag gis re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bstod pa bla na ma mchis pa dag gis bstod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-0: bdag gis mig mi 'dzum pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdul gcig gi steng du sems kyi skad cig gi tshad kyis rgyal ba rnams @307a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-1: kyis gtams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mthong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-3: bdag gis nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dag na 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-5: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-8: bdag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can dmyal ba rnams su zhugs te sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su sprul nas sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur zhing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-9: de na sems can de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-10: de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-11: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-13: yi dvags rnams la'ang de bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-14: gnod sbyin rnams la'ang de bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307a-15: srin po rnams la'ang de bzhin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-4: sha za rnams la'ang de bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-5: srul po rnams la'ang de bzhin lus srul po rnams la'ang de bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-6: mi gdol pa rnams la'ang de bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-8: smad 'tshong ma rnams la'ang de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-10: sems can rigs ji lta bur skyes ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-11: de dag gis lus ji lta bu thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-12: sems can las kyi rkyen ji lta bus bde ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-13: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-14: bzo'i gnas ji lta bu dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-15: las kyi gnas ji lta bu dag la chags pa rnams la de lta bu'i lus su sprul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-17: las kyi gnas de lta bu dag la brtson pa ston par bgyid cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-18: de lta bu'i yi ge brjod pas sems can rnams kyi sems mgu bar bgyid cing chos kyang ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing btsud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:307b-20: rab tu 'god par yang gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-0: bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu po thams cad dag na sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la'ang ci nas kyang sngon @308a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-1: sems kyi rgyud la'ang ci nas kyang sngon gyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-2: nyon mongs pa ma lus par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-3: sems can 'ga'i sems kyi rgyud kyi lam yang bdud bzhis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-4: de'i slad du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri'ang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba rdul bral spos mtho dbang phyug rgyal po skar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri sngo snang ba rdul bral gyi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ltar yongs su dag par 'jog par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-5: de bzhin du bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-6: bdag gi 'khor yang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' seng ge spos kyis smon lam btab pa bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-8: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag gi sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-9: thams cad kyang sems mnyen par gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308a-11: rang rang gi gling bzhi pa dag nas sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dag mthong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308b-0: sems can de dag la rin po che sna tshogs @308b dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308b-7: ba dan dag bdog par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308b-8: des sems can de dag sangs rgyas de dag la'ang mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308b-11: bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin snang ba bkod pa'i mthus bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308b-18: sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par byed par yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308b-19: de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la mchod pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag byed par yang spro bar yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308b-21: de'i phyir khyod kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:308b-22: kun tu bzang po khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309a-0: bskal ba grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas @309a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309a-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes kyi chu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309a-2: kun tu bzang po khyod ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos gtugs pa dang; de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309a-6: brtul zhugs bzang po rab tu dga' ba sems dul longs //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309a-8: khyod kyis sems can nyon mongs mi bzad klung las sgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309a-9: khyod ni 'jig rten ye shes sgron mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309a-11: yang de'i tshe na srog chags le lo can khris tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309b-0: bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems @309b dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa cing yongs su dag par 'jog par 'gyur ba na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bgyi'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309b-5: khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams de'i kho ra khor yug dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309b-6: stong stong zhing mtshan mthun pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309b-8: stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa me lce thab khung dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:309b-9: gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa sdom pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:310a-0: gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin @310a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:310a-5: nyi ma'i dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:310a-15: gnas kyi gos bsags rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:310a-16: ye shes blo gros bsam yas snying po dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321a-10: sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin padma la snyoms par zhugs shing des bsam pa la spong ba rnam par dag par gyur pa de lta bur sems can rnams kyang lus dang sems kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321a-11: gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe sa gzhi thams cad gser gyi kha dog lta bur gda' bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321a-13: des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can thams cad kyang ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe sa gzhi thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos @321b bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-1: blo gros rab mchog sems mi 'khrugs pa longs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-2: lag pa'i mthil na 'khor lo mchog rab gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-3: mi rnams mang po snying rje'i sems la bkod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-4: blo gros dge khyod 'gro ba'i ston par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-6: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu bcu pa gangs kyi nor bu zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-7: rgyal bu gangs kyi nor bus kyang ji ltar mi 'khrugs pas smon lam btab pa de bzhin du smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-9: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bgyid pa thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-10: thams cad kyi sug par yang tsandan sprul gyi snying po'i dri 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-11: de dag thams cad kyis dri de'ang sangs rgyas kyi sku dag la yongs su bsngo bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-13: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smon lam rgya chen po btab pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-15: gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi lag tu tsandan sprul gyi snying po bzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-16: bsam pa thag pas sangs rgyas yid la byed pa bskyed pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:321b-18: de'i phyir khyod spos kyi glang po che zhes bya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322a-0: spos kyi glang po che khyod ni bskal pa grangs med pa gang+g'a'i @322a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322a-1: klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322a-3: dam pa'i chos nub nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322a-4: spos kyi glang po che khyod 'jig rten gyi khams der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322a-6: spos kyi glang po ches yang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322a-8: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe kun dga'i ra ba de thams cad du me tog tsam pa ka'i char rab tu 'bab par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322a-10: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe kun dga'i ra ba de thams cad me tog tsam pa ka'i char mngon par @322b rab tu bab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-2: shin tu dri zhim tshogs rab mchog sems longs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-3: me tog tsam pa mchog gi char 'di babs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-4: rab tu gya nom dge ba'i lam ston la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-5: 'gro ba mang po 'jigs med sgor 'khod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-7: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu bcu gcig pa seng ge zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-8: ji ltar spos kyi glang po ches smon lam btab pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la rin po che'i rgyal mtshan phul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-13: khyod rin po che'i thog ces bya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-14: rin po che'i tog khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+g'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-15: de'i dam pa'i chos nub nas par gyi bskal pa gsum 'das pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgyal ba'i zla ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:322b-16: der khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323a-1: glang po rnam par bsgrags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323a-2: khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323a-3: rin po che'i tog gi sa gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323a-5: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323a-6: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323a-7: slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta'i dran pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323a-9: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la phyag byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323a-10: de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323a-11: sems can thams cad snying rje'i sems la bkod par gyur pa de lta bu'i dran pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i @323b tog la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-1: blo gros legs pa gzugs mchog brtan pa longs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-2: sems can phyir ni dam bcas rab brtan byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-3: skye bo mang po rdul bral sems la bzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-4: mi mchog sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog tu 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-5: de ltar snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-6: mnyen des la sogs pa rgyal bu lnga brgyas kyang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su blangs pa de ltar smon lam btab cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-7: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su blangs nas; thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-8: gzhan yang rgyal bu bzhi brgyas kyang rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis ji lta bu de lta bu'i sangs rgyas zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:323b-9: de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324a-0: gzhan yang rgyal bu dgu bcus kyang kun tu bzang pos ji lta ba de lta bu'i smon @324a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324a-1: lam btab cing de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324a-2: khams gyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po thams cad kyis kyang so so nas smon lam khyad par can dag btab cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324a-3: so so nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su blangs nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324a-4: de bzhin du srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324a-5: bye ba phrag gnyis kyis kyang so so nas smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongs su blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324a-6: thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos de bzhin du khyed cag kyang dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-0: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i gcen gcung po brgyad cu po de dag gi thu bo bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang @324b phyug khyab bdag ces bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-2: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-3: bram ze'i khye'u khyed kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-4: bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-5: yab rje khyod kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-6: rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-7: bu rje khyod kyis smon lam thob cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-8: kho bos phyis smon lam gdab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-10: yab gcig sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su blang bar bgyi lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-11: 'on te yongs su ma dag pa blang bar bgyi lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-12: mdun na 'don gyi gtso bos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-13: bram ze'i khye'u gang dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can yongs su len par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-14: sems can bsam pa nyon mongs pa can lta ba log par gyur pa dag 'dul ba'ang yongs su len par byed pas khyod bdag rang gis shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:324b-16: de nas bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong sta phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug nas 'di skad @325a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-3: bdag gi skye dgu lo brgyad khri thub pa na byang chub dam pa la reg par gyur pa de lta bur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub btsal lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-5: ji ltar da ltar gyi sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-8: skyo ba'i bsam pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-10: skyon du lta ba de ltar gang du bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can rnams kyang de lta bur gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-11: de dag kyang bdag las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-12: bdag kyang sems can rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-14: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-15: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325a-17: bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-0: bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la ba pa na bskal pa autpa la yang dag @325b rtog ces bya ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling bzhi pa mchog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing skye dgu'i lo brgyad khri thub pa na byang chub mngon par thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che brtsegs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-5: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du kun dga'i ra ba 'di thams cad du mug ti dmar po'i char dag rab tu 'bab par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-6: shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-8: gang gi cho bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lnga sa phyag byas pa de'i tshe kun dga'i ra ba de thams cad du mu tig dmar po'i char dag kyang rab tu bab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-9: shing ljon pa de thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-11: mthu mchog mi zad shes rab mdzod longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-12: sems can snying brtse phan 'dod byams pa'i sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-13: khyod kyi bsam pa dag pa rdzogs 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:325b-14: 'jig rten sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326a-1: yang dag 'byung zhes bya ba des kyang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis ji lta ba de bzhin du gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326a-3: bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyang bskal pa autpa la yang dag rtog la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing skye dgu'i lo brgyad khrir 'phel ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326a-5: gsum pas kyang gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326a-6: lo nyis stong pa na skar ma'i dri zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326a-8: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sna ma'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326b-2: n+ya gro dha rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326b-6: rin chen gtsug tor can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326b-17: gzugs bzang dang dri zhim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326b-22: thugs kyi re ba bzang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326b-41: yang dag 'byung dang; me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:326b-54: sred med kyi bu'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327a-0: skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dag @327a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327a-1: tu 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327a-3: de nas mdun na 'don gyi bu thams cad kyi tha chung 'jigs pa'i gdung bral zhes bya ba gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327a-5: bram ze'i khye'u bdun cu rtsa dgu po 'di dag thams cad bskal pa autpa la yang dag rtog gi'ang skye ba gnyis pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa lags pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327a-7: bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327a-8: bskal pa autpa la yang dag rtog pas par 'gyur ba na thams cad kyi tha mar byang chub mchog la reg par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327a-9: sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa bdag byang chub thob pa gcig bu'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327a-10: de dag gi 'dul ba ji snyed mchis par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327a-11: ji ltar de dag theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston par 'gyur ba bdag gcig pu'i yang de snyed du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327b-0: ji ltar de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed mchis par 'gyur ba bdag byang chub thob pa gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi @327b dge 'dun yang de snyed du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327b-1: sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po de dag byung ba'i bskal ba autpa la yang dag rtog de la sems can gang dag gis mi'i lus thob par gyur ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bskal ba bas par 'gyur ba na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas theg pa gsum po dag gi nges pa la dgod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327b-3: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327b-4: de'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos 'jigs pa'i gdung bral la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327b-7: skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la snying rje zhing phan par byed par zhugs pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:327b-9: bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa autpa la yang dag rtog de zad kar thams cad kyi tha mar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328a-1: pa rdul bral yang dag 'phags mngon 'phags zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328a-2: ji ltar sangs rgyas bdun rtsa dgu po de dag gi tshe bskal ba phyed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod gcig pu'i yang bskal pa phyed du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328a-3: ji ltar smon lam btab pa'i smon lam de dag thams cad kyi bar yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328a-6: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328a-7: de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du me tog sngon po'i char shin tu dri bda' ba dag 'bab par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328a-9: sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi khams rnams rab tu dang zhing mi mthun pa ma mchis par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328a-10: sems can thams cad kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-0: gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u 'jigs pa'i gdung bral gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du me tog sngon po'i tshar dag kyang rab tu byung ba sems can thams cad kyis kyang dri de @328b tshor bar gyur nas de dag thams cad kyi khams rnams kyang snyoms shing mi mthun pa med par gnas par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-1: de na sems can thams cad la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-3: snying rje brtul zhugs dul ba'i sems longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-4: 'jig rten mgon po mang po mchod 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-5: nyon mongs g-yo mdud dam po gcod 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-6: dge ba dam pa shes rab mdzod du 'gyur ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-7: bam po brgyad pa rigs kyi bu bram ze de'i slob ma bye ba phrag gsum kun dga'i ra ba'i sgo na 'dug pa de dag gis kyang sems can 'ongs pa rnams gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la bkod cing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-9: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis slob ma de dag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhang gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-12: smon lam ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-13: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:328b-16: spyod pa ji lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-0: rjes su dran pa ji lta bus byang @329a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-3: bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa'i mdzod bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par bsgrub par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-5: bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-6: ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-7: shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-8: chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-10: lam de ni de lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-11: bram ze'i khye'u de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshogs rnam par dag pa sdud pa zhes bya ba tshogs nyams su len par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-12: chos kyi sgo sbyin pa'i tshogs yongs su gtod bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-13: des ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329a-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su byed @329b bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i tshogs ni rtogs pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni shes pa thogs pa med par bye dpar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tshom dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni 'dul ba la mi skyo bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjes su chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-11: khong khro ba spong bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:329b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-1: sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad spong bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i las byas pa chud mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba spel ba sgom pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo'i bye brag 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i tshogs ni don gyi rnam pa'i rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag ba'i tshogs ni lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-10: chos la so sor rtog par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spong ba'i tshogs ni dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330a-13: sems yang ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni sdom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed @330b par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying por byed pa drug gi tshogs ni 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-5: bram ze'i khye'u tshogs rnam par dag pa sdud pa zhes bya ba de ni tshogs nyams su lon par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i tshogs ni longs spyod chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-8: g-yog 'khor mang por 'gyur bar gsungs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims ni mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-10: thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-13: sgom pa ni 'khor ba las rgal bar byed n par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-14: mdun na 'don gyis smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-15: bram ze'i khyuru' gang dag 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams ni sbyin pa spyin par byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-17: de'ang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:330b-18: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni rul ba'i sems kyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-0: zhi gnas kyi sems kyis tshul @331a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-2: rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis thos pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-3: snying rje chen po'i sems kyis bsgom pa bsgom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-4: chos lhag ma rnams kyang shes rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-6: thabs kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste; bram ze'i khye'u /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-7: de ni byang chub kyi lam yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-8: tshogs de lta bus byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-10: bsgom pa ni de lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-11: dran pa ni de lta bu yin; byang chub kyi lam gyi spyod pa ni de lta bu yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-13: byang chub tu 'dun pa skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-15: byang chub kyi lam ni yang dag pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-16: bsam pa thag pa nas smon lam thob cig dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-18: bsam pa thag pas byang chub kyi lam ni dang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-20: g-yo med pas rnam par dag pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-21: nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal bas byang chub kyi lam ni drang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-23: bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pas byang chub kyi lam ni grub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331a-25: smon lam thob la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-0: yongs su ma dag pa ji @331b lta bu 'dod pa long zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-2: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-4: bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-5: sems can 'dod chags chung ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-6: zhe sdang chung ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-7: gti mug chung ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-8: sems 'khrul pa ma mchis zhing ma 'khrul ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-9: 'khon pa'i sems ma mchis pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-10: phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems rnam par spangs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-11: log par lta ba'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-12: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems la gnas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-13: dge bar sems pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-14: dge ba yongs su tshol bar sems pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-15: ngan song gsum gyi lam rnam par spong bar sems pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-16: mtho ris kyi lam gsum la brtson par sems pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:331b-17: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-0: theg pa gsum po dag la brtson par sems dpa' rnams kyi slad du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'dir bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang @332a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-1: chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-3: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du bdag gi sug pa lag pa gnyis su glang po che'i gtso bo dag 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-4: tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus de'i lag pa gnyis su glang po che'i gtso bo thal kar yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa dag byung bar gyur pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-6: khyed cag cung zad tsam zhig thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la deng la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-7: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i char shin tu dri zhim pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sems can thams cad sad par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-8: de'i thigs pas sems can thams cad sad par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-9: de'i thigs pas sems can gang dag gi lus la phog gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-10: gang dag gis dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag gi sgrib pa lnga spangs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-12: 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa spangs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332a-18: the tshom gyi sgrib pa sbyangs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-0: tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu glang po che de dag steng gi bar snang la 'di ltar @332b mgyogs par dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-3: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa brkyad pa las bskum pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-4: bskum pa las brkyang pa de bzhin du de ltar mgyogs par dong nas; glang po che'i gtso bo de dag gis ji skad sngar smras pa'i bya ba dag byas nas phyir log ste de'i mdun du la bod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-6: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog shin tu yid dga' bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-7: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-8: rigs kyi bu khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab na bskal pa sgra snang zhes bya ba la gling bzhi pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sgra yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che chen po'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i khyu mchog gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas gtugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-13: rdul dang rnam bral sems can rnam dag longs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-14: khyod kyi sems can bye mang lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:332b-15: byang chub phyir ni rab dag lam sbyong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333a-4: bram ze'i khye'u bye ba phrag gsum po gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos lung bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333a-5: tha ma ni sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333a-7: thams cad skyob kyi bar dag tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333a-8: bram ze'i khye'u lung bstan pa de dag thams cad las gang dag rig byed klog pa'i bram ze stong zhig yod pa'i thu bo mang pos bla mar bkur ba khyab 'jug rlung zhes bya ba des gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333a-9: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333a-12: gti mug bdo ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333a-13: bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong zhes bya ba des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333a-14: kye mkhan po khyab 'jug rlung 'dis don gyi dbang ji zhig mthong na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par smon lam 'debs par bgyid lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-0: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang @333b ldan par byang chub thob par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-1: sems can skyabs med pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-2: dpung gnyen med pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-3: nyon mongs pa ngag gis gtses pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-4: lta bas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams kyi don byed cing skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-5: sems can rnams skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-6: yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god par byed cing sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros tshim par byed do zhes grag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-7: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par smon lam 'debs par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po yin par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-9: khyab 'jug rlung khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:333b-10: skyes bu dam pa khyod der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom @334a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-4: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-5: de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa gnyis bdag gi spyi bor 'jog par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-8: gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u khyab 'jug rlung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' khyab 'jug rlung gi spyi bor zhabs gnyis bzhag ste bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-9: snying rje bsam pa shes rab rnon po longs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-10: byang chub mchog phyir spyad pa spyod gyis la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-11: brtan pa nyon mongs 'ching ba dam chod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-12: khyod ni phan pas snying brtse sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-14: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334a-16: bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing @334b 'dir sems can 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-2: gti mug gi sems du mnyam pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-3: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bsam pa la mi gnas pa'i skye dgu tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-5: bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni mi mjed ces bya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-6: ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni mi mjed ces bya zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-7: sems can de dag 'dod chags la mi mjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-8: de dag zhe sdang la mi mjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-9: gti mug la mi mjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-10: nyon mongs pa'i 'chid ba rnams la mi mjed pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni mi mjed ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bskal pa chen po bzang po zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-12: ci'i phyir bzang po zhes bya zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-13: bskal pa chen po bzang po de la sems can 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-15: gti mug spyod pa rnams kyi nang du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:334b-16: skyes bu dam pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po byung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-0: skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri @335a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-1: thub pa na thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshangs rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-3: theg pa gsum po dag gi chos ston par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-4: 'khor ba'i chu bos bdas pa'i sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag kyang sgrol bar 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu 'god par yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma skyong gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag ldas mgo bos phyag byas nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-8: de nas bram ze'u khye'u gnyis pa tam bu ru zhes bya ba'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-10: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi rjes su mtshams sbyor zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-11: 'jig rten gyi skye dgu tshe lo sum khri thub pa na sangs rgyas su 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-0: bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung @335b bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du bskal pa bzang po byung ba'i tes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi rjes su mtshams sbyor zhing skye dgu'i tshe lo sum khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-2: 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-3: des bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-6: me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la 'thor zhing thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-7: shin tu 'brel pa legs bsgrags rab snyan gsung ba po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-8: ma 'khrul ma 'dres ma rnyogs dri ma mi mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-9: khyad 'phags shin tu sdom brtson blo rab blo gros ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-10: drang srong dam pa khyod mdzes thub gtso khyu mchog lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-11: yon tan brgyas gtams yon tan mang po stsol ba khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-12: thub mchog bde ba mdzad pa mi yi dam pas btud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-13: srid pa gsum na khyod 'dra'i sems gzhan ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:335b-14: deng khyod sems can mang po byang chub lam lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-1: khye'u kun gyis bsrungs zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar rin po che sna bdun gyi khri'u bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-2: rin thang 'bum gyi bshams pas bshams nas khri'u de la gser gyi lhung bzed rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-3: gser gyi ril ba bhring ga ra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-4: rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod sdong dag bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-5: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas des gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-7: bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po de la tshe 'grib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-8: rtsod pa'i dus kyi mtshan ma byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-14: ser snas kun nas dkris pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-15: sems can log par lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-16: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-17: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems kun nas langs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems yongs su nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336a-19: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems rnam par spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336b-0: log pas 'tsho zhing mi dge ba'i sems @336b dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336b-2: dam pa'i chos nub nas 'jig rten long bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336b-3: 'dren pa ma mchis pa skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bram ze kun gyi bsrungs la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336b-9: skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rtsod pa'i dus kyi mtshan ma byung zhing skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336b-10: 'jig rten long bar gyur cing 'dren pa med pa'i nang du smon lam btab pa ni rtogs pa che zhing ye shes dang ldan pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336b-12: de'i phyir khyod mkhas mdzod snying rje rten ces bya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:336b-13: mkhas mdzod snying rje rten khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bskal pa bzang po byung zhing skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas mdzod snying rje rten gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-5: phye ma dag gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-6: mi mchog phan pa mdzad pa dga' bar bgyid pa skyed pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-7: zhal 'dzum rab tu dgyes pa shin tu snyan pa'i gsung mnga' ba; ;gnas mkhyen mkhas pa phan pa mdzad pa stobs bcu rab mchog ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-8: ye shes bsam gtan rnam par mthar phyin bde gshegs khyod la bdud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-9: spyod pa mang po spyod pa zhal ni rnam rgyas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-10: khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag mang po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-11: gzhal yas byang chub slad du lung yang bstan pa mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-12: mi mchog bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-14: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bram ze'i khye'u bzhi pa bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med ces bya ba la yang dag par bskul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337a-16: de nas bram ze'i khye'u bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-1: bdag kyang de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po de la byang chub par 'tshal mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-2: rtsod pa'i dus de lta bu 'ba' zhig mi 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-3: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas skye dgu tshe lo khri thub pa nas sems can sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-5: yang dag par sdom pa'i bsam pa bas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-6: nor bdun dang bral pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-7: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ston par 'du shes par sems pa la zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-8: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang; legs par spyod pa gsum dang brel ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-9: nyes par spyod pa gsum po dag la brtson pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-10: nyon mongs pa'i mun pas sems rnam par dkrugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-11: theg pa gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba de'i dus su ni sus kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa sgrub par rdo mi thog lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-12: skye dgu tshe lo stong thub pa na lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te; sems can de dag kyang tshe lo brgya ba'i bar du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-13: de'i dus na ni sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ming yang ma mchis na dge ba'i rtsa ba spyod pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:337b-14: re zhig snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten tshe 'bri zhing lo brgya par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-0: mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma nye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i dus na bdag lha rnams @338a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-1: kyi nang nas babs shing sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-2: mi dge ba spangs nas dge ba la spyod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-3: sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar dag la rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-4: sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyis yongs su sbyong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-5: theg pa gsum po dag la yang sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-6: snyigs ma lnga dag yongs su spong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-7: skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-13: ser sna chung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston cing theg pa gsum po dag la yang dag par sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-15: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338a-17: gang gi tshe bdag de ltar lung bstan pa thob nas theg pa gang gis myur du 'khor ba las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i nyan thos kyi sa'ang don du mi gnyer la /
