K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-0: rang sangs @338b rgyas kyi sa'ang don mi gnyer lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-3: byang chub sems dpa' le lo can rnams kyi dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-4: le lo'i dngos po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni yun ring por 'khor bar 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-6: 'khor ba'i btson rar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-8: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la la cho ga dman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-10: yongs su gtong ba dman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-11: smon lam dman pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-12: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dman pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-15: yid kyi spyod pa ma bsdams shing tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs zhing rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-18: thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing kun la'ang yongs su mi gtong ba lha dang mi'i dpal dang bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:338b-20: pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su mi len cing 'dul ba la rtog pa'i smon lam yang yongs su mi len pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-0: chos bzhi po de dag dang @339a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-1: ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' le lo can ni yun ring por 'khor ba'i btson rar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-4: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa bsdams shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-5: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-6: thams cad yongs su gtong zhing kun la'ang yongs su gtong la sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje'i sems bskyed cing sbyin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-7: lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-8: 'dul ba la rtog pa'i smon lam yongs su 'dzin par byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-9: chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339a-10: chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam nye bar rton par byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-0: pha rol @339b tu phyin pa rnams la mngon par brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-1: sems can rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po gtong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-2: tshangs pa'i gnas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-3: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-4: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhis ngoms mi myong bar gnas par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-6: sbyin pas ngoms mi myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-7: chos nyan pas ngoms mi myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-8: bsgom pas ngoms mi myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-9: sems can rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos pos ngoms mi myong bar gnas par bya ba dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-10: byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa'i gter bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-12: byang chub sems dpas dad pa mi zad pa'i gter yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-15: sems can dbul po yongs su gzung ba mi zad pa'i gter yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dag go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-16: bzhi po 'di dag ni bdag med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-18: sems can med pa'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-19: srog med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-20: gang zag med pa'i phyir shes rab yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:339b-21: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340a-1: dpas chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340a-2: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing nam mkha'i 'khor lo'ang skor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340a-5: brjod du med pa'i 'khor lo dang; nges par 'byin pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340a-7: bskor du med pa'i 'khor lo'ang skor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340a-8: bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340a-9: bskal pa bzang po la bab nas ring po ma lon zhing snyigs ma lnga rab tu zhi ba'i dus la bab pa na skye dgu tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340a-11: bram ze'i khye'u bgreng bya'i bu dri ma med kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340a-12: bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-0: phye ma dag gis mchod pa byed pa la brtson zhing tshigs su bcad pas mngon par @340b bstod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-1: mgon po khyod ni dpral ba'i dbyes che mdzod spu gangs mdog mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-2: khyod ni gser gyi ri bo brtsegs pa 'dra zhing yid du mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-3: yon tan brgyas gtams pa dag dus 'di gsungs 'gro na'ang bdag 'tshang rgya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-4: thub pa khyu mchog 'jig rten sgron khyod la ni su mi 'dud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-5: bram ze mdun na 'don rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-6: bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong po thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-10: byams pa lung bstan pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-11: bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa seng ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-13: dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du thams cad kyis kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-14: de dag thams cad kyi nu bo tha chung gang yin pa de la'ang mdun na 'don gyis 'di skad du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-15: kye bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang ring du brtag tu ci yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:340b-16: sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed cig ces yang dag par bskul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang mngon par go bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-0: sems can gang dag rga dang nad dang @341a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-1: 'chi 'pho'i 'jigs pa sred pa'i klung du lhung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-2: phung po rnams la zhen pa'i mi dag srid pa'i btson ra rab tu 'jigs par chud pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-3: phan tshun gsod par byed pa'i nyon mongs dug 'thungs nas ni sdug bsngal rgya mtshor rab tu gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-4: gti mug gis ni lam stor long ba bzhin du mi gtsang 'khrul 'khor dag na 'khyams par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-5: log par lta la gnas pas 'byung po thams cad srid pa gsum na sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-6: srog chags thams cad 'gro ba lnga po dag na ji ltar 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin du 'khor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-7: 'gro ba lnga po dag na chos kyi mig nyams skyabs med sems can rnams ni dran gyis la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-8: yang dag shes rab kyi ni ne ma nur yid gnyis spongs la byang chub don du 'dun pa skyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-9: 'gro ba rnams kyi sred pa'i mya ngan sol la sems can rnams kyi gnyen du gyur par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-10: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching ba dgrol bar bya phyir byang chub don du sems kyang gzhol gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-11: gti mug bral ba chos mig rnam par nyams pa rnams la lam gyi dam pa sbyin par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-12: 'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ra dag na 'bar ba rnams la chos kyi bcud kyis tshim gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341a-13: phan par byed pa khyed ni myur du nye bar song la thub pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-0: re ba thams cad @341b grub smon bkra shis ldan pa rab brten 'dren pas sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-1: 'jig rten dag na sems can rnams kyi dbugs 'byin gyis la srid pa'i mtsho las sems can thon; ;gya nom thar pa'i lam dang dbang po'i stobs dang byang chub yan lag sbyin byed 'gyur bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-2: chos sprin chos kyi char pa rab tu phob ste sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-4: de nas bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang des kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-6: bdag ni 'khor ba las mngon par dga' ba'i ngang la ma 'tshal la; nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang mi 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-8: bla na med pa'i theg pa 'tshal ba lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-9: kye mkhan po yud tsam zhig gzhes la bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa la gson cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-11: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de nas phyir byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-12: rang gi bsnyen bkur ba bram ze'i khye'u lnga po dag la bos te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-14: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-15: de dag gis kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:341b-16: bdag cag la gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi ba cung zad kyang ma mchis lags na dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsrungs pa bdag cag gis ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342a-1: gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bsnyen bkur ba dang po lo thang spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi kha dog gi rgyan dag byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342a-2: bsnyen bkur ba gnyis pa thang la spyod ces bya ba de la rin po che sna bdun gyi rna cha byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342a-3: bsnyen bkur ba gsum pa chu la spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi khri byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342a-4: bsnyen bkur ba bzhi pa shugs kyis spyod ces bya ba de la rin po che sna bdun gyi 'khar ba byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342a-5: bsnyen bkur ba lnga pa snying po spyod ces bya ba de la ni gser gyi ri la ba bhring ga ra byin nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342a-7: khyod cag deng la dngos po 'di dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342a-8: de nas bsnyen bkur ba lnga po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong ste de ltar bkur ba'i dngos po de dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342a-9: bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis bdag cag bskal pa bzang po de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-0: snga ma bzhin du sbyar @342b te; de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bram ze'i khye'u lo thang spyod ni bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa brtan dbyangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-1: thang la spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bde dbang blo gros zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-2: chu la spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa don bcas gsung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-3: shugs kyis spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-4: bram ze'i khye'u snying po spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug phud ces bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-5: bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag bskal ba bzang por lung bstan ma thag tu mdun na 'don gyis yang bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag long zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-8: smon lam ji lta bu 'dod pa'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-9: sems can thams cad kyang chos kyi bcud kyis mgron du gnyer cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-10: brtson 'grus brtan pos rang gi byang chub kyi spyad pa'ang spyod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:342b-11: yang dang yang du ring du ma rtog cig ces lag pa nas bzung ste bcom ldan 'das la phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343a-0: de nas bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chad de'ang @343a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po de la thub pa nyi ma mang nyung ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying ps bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343a-5: bram ze'i khye'u bskal pa bzang po de la ni thub pa nyi ma stong rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343a-8: bskal pa chen po bzang po de la rgyal ba nyi ma gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi tha mar bram ze'i khye'u gces lag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug phud ces bgyi bar 'gyur ba de srid du yun ring por bdag gis brtul zhugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343a-13: yang dag par sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343a-19: shes rab kyi tshogs sna tshogs dag yang dag par bsdu zhing byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343a-20: bskal ba bzang po pa de dag thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par dang por bsod snyoms kyang dbul bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-0: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams @343b kyi sku gdung dag pa'ang mchod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-1: de dag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-2: sems can tshul khrims dang bral ba rnams ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-3: 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-4: sems can lta ba dang bral zhing nyam nga ba thob par gyur pa rnams ni yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-5: 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-6: de bzhin du bsam ba dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-7: de bzhin du cho ga dang bral ba rnams ni cho ga la rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-8: sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang des par ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dam pa'i chos nub nas ring po ma lon par bdag gis 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-10: dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-12: dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-13: mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na sems can rnams srog gcod pa spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-14: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar la rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:343b-15: sems can rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-0: lam ngan pa dag nas bton cing yang dag pa'i lam du 'god par gyur @344a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-2: nyes par spyod pa'i mun pa 'jig par bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-3: legs par spyod pa'i snang bston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-4: 'jig rten na dus kyi snyigs ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-7: nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'i bar dag 'jig par bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-8: mu ge'i bskal ba bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na bdag sems can rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cig 'dzud par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-10: bdag dang sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la sbyor bar bgyid pa na thams cad du mu ge'i mun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-16: 'gyed pa dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-17: sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la nyon mongs pa'i me'i gdung ba dag zhi bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-18: nad kyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na bdag gis sems can rnams snying por 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-19: mthun pa'i chos drug yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-20: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la sbyor bar bgyid cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344a-21: sems can rnams kyi nad kyi mun pa rnam par 'jig par bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-0: sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar @344b bgyid pa'i bar du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-1: bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar par bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-2: gang gi tshe bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong rtsa bzhi 'byung ba dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par gyur pa na de'i 'og tu gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-3: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong rtsa bzhi po dag gi sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam par bdag gis byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du ring bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-4: de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed par bdag gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-5: bskal pa bzang po de la sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po de dag gis sems can ji snyed btul bar gyur ba'i sems can de snyed cig bdag gis kyang btul bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-6: sems can gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos kyi bslab pa la 'khrul par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-7: lta ba'i g-yang sar lhung bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma gus pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:344b-9: rab tu sdang ba'i sems su gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-0: @345a *// 'khrul ba'i sems su gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-2: 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-3: mtshams med pa bgyid par gyur pa dag kyang bdag gis byang chub thob nas 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'byin cing mi 'jigs pa'i khyim mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'dzud par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-4: ji srid du bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bas par ma gyur pa de srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po'ang bas par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-5: bdag gi dam pa'i chos bas par gyur pa na bskal pa bzang po'ang bas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-6: bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing mtshan re re'ang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa dpag tu ma mchos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-7: grangs ma mchis pa dag tu gyur te gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dpag tu ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-9: grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag tu bzhud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-10: sangs rgyas kyi sku re res kyang sems can dpag tu ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-11: grangs ma mchis pa rnams theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345a-12: 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-0: @345b sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na bar gyi bskal pa zhig par ma gyur pa der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag bzhud nas ji ltar sngar brjod pa de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing slad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams rin po che dang bral bar gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu mchis shing rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-2: gter dag kyang rab tu ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams dge ba'i spyod pa dang bral zhing nad kyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang tsandan sa mchog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-5: dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag gi spos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-6: spos kyi char de dag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-8: lus kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-9: de nas sems can de dag kyang bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dag la mngon par brtson par 'gyur zing mtho ris la gzhol bar yang gyur cig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-10: bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:345b-11: bdag byang chub thob nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346a-1: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag gi sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346a-3: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346a-4: sems can rnams kyi sman du'ang mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa de dag bslus par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346a-8: srog chags bye ba phrag mang po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing lung bstan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gis thugs byung bar bgyis par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346a-9: bdag byang chub kyi slad du yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor ban sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346a-13: dge ba'i chos bgyid pa'i sgra dag rna lam du grag par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346b-0: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bur yongs su rdzogs par mi @346b 'gyur zhing sems can rnams kyi sman du'ang mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag rtag tu mnar med par rtogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346b-6: khyod ni sems can rnams kyi sman du 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar bar byed par yang 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346b-8: de'i phyir khyod sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346b-9: sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon par rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i bar dag bzhin du bsod snyoms 'bul bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:346b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug phud bzang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa gsal mdzad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @347a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347a-2: khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347a-3: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed du 'gyur ba khyod gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347a-4: sems can de snyed kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347a-5: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ji srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po'i bskal pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347a-6: de srid du sangs rgyas kyi sku dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu spos kyi char pas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347a-8: lus kyi nad rnams kyi bar dag kyang rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347a-9: sems can rnams kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la rab tu 'god cing mtho ris la gzhol bar byed par yang 'gyur ro ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347a-11: rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347b-0: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gis bdag @347b gi spyi bo la byug par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa'i spyi bo la bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyi brgyan pa'i phyag gis yongs su byug pa mdzad nas de na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa sems dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos phyag byas nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347b-6: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lha'i ka shi ka'i gos bskon te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347b-10: khyod kyis smon lam bzang po btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347b-11: da phyin chad khyod kyis kho bo'i bsnyen bkur bya mi dgos kyi ji ltar bde ba nyid du spyod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347b-13: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:347b-14: ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa 'khor 'di na snang ba ltar bdag gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348a-0: sems can chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis ni smon lam rgya che ba dgu btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba @348a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348a-1: sha stag yongs su blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348a-2: khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis rtsod pa'i dus yongs su spangs pas bdag gis ni rtsod pa'i dus la bab par gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348a-3: sems can rnams chos kyi bcud kyis mgron du gnyer bar bya zhing brtson 'grus brtan por bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348a-4: bdag gis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348a-5: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348a-9: lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di yang bdag la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di'ang bdag la legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing lung ston par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348a-11: de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa'ang mdzad la pho nya dag kyang gtong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348b-0: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang de thos shing pho nya de dag kyang mthong bar @348b 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348b-1: gang yang phyi ma'i dus na snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de lta bu'i rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du smon lam gyis byang chub yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing chos kyi mu ge'i dgon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348b-3: nad dag gi sa 'das par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'ang mdzad par 'gyur la sems can rnams la'ang chos ston par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348b-4: bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag 'das kyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348b-5: dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing snyan pa dang dbyangs kyang sgrog par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du bdag gi smon lam gyi tshul yang brjod par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:348b-7: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i smon lam thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349a-0: de dag kyang sems can rnams la snying rje chen po @349a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349a-2: de nas de dag kyang smon lam de lta bu dag nyid yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing ji ltar de ltar bdag gis yongs su bzung ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can dag tu de dag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349a-3: chu bo bzhis bdas par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur zhing theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349a-4: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bar dag la 'god par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i smon lam gyis seng ge'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349a-6: mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i smon lam de lta bu dag yang dag par bskyed nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349a-7: yang de'i tshe na lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po [?] gsil dkrol zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349a-8: me tog gi char rab tu phab nas tshig mthun par smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349a-12: khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song la smon lam rab mchog dag shod la gzung zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-0: khyod ni nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa'i @349b 'jig rten du sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ye shes kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur re //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-1: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag kyang thal mo sbyar te mngon du phyogs nas tshig mthun par smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-5: mkhas pa rab mchog bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa blo mchog mnga' ba smon lam brtan por thob cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-6: bdag cag kyang nyan par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-7: gang gi tshe mdun na 'don song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dun na 'don gyis pus mo'i lha nga btsugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-9: de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam pa de thams cad g-yos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-16: sil snyan dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'khrol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-18: bya gag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-19: shing ljon pa dag las kyang me tog dag 'brul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-20: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:349b-21: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams ma gtogs par gang su dag sa la rten cing gnas pa'i 'byung po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-0: byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pa gang yin pa de dag @350a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-1: thams cad kyang phan pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-3: kho na med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-4: rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-6: ngo mtshar gyi sems dag tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-7: sems can gang dag nam mkha' la rgyu ba de dag kyang bram ze'i smon lam sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba mnyan pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'khod nas 'di ltar mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-14: gos dang; ras bcos bu dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-15: de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi lha gang ji snyed pa rnams kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-16: bram ze'i smon lam mnyan pa'i phyir dzambu'i gling du babs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-19: ras bcos bu'i bar dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-20: bram zes kyang thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-21: bsam gtan dag gis rnam grol tshangs pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-22: gzugs kyis 'od gsal brgya byin 'dra ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-23: rgyal po bzhin du nor 'bru rab gtong zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-24: rin chen mchog mnga' thub pa tshong dpon bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350a-25: zhi ba sgrogs mdzad ri la seng ge 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-0: @350b mi 'gul brtan pa lhun po 'dra ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-1: rgya mtsho bzhin du 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-2: yon tan skyon la sa bzhin mtshungs par spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-3: dri ma thams cad ded pa chu bzhin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-4: thub pa me ltar nyon mongs nags rnams bsreg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-5: rlung ltar gang la'ang chags pa mi mnga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-6: thub pa lha ltar yang dag nyid kyang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-7: klu ltar thub pa chos kyi char 'babs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-8: char pa bzhin du 'gro kun ngoms par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-9: pha rol mu stegs 'joms pa seng ge 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-10: me tog bzhin du yon tan dri yang gtong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-11: tshangs pa bzhin du snyan pa'i tshig gsung zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-12: 'gro ba sdug bsngal grol mdzad sman pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-13: sems mnyam nye bar gnas pa ma bzhin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-14: 'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'dzin mdza' bshes 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-15: nga rgyal dgra 'joms rdo rje brtan bzhin te; ;thub pa mtshon bzhin srid pa'i 'khri shing gcod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-16: zam pa'i shing bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-17: klu ltar thub pa mi shes rtsva rnams bsreg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-18: thub pa zla ltar 'od bsil gtong mdzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-19: mi yi padma kha 'byed nyi ma bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-20: 'bras bu mchog bzhi sbyin mdzad ljon shing 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-21: thub pa bya bzhin drang srong tshogs kyis bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-22: rgyal ba'i blo yangs rgya mtsho 'dra ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-23: 'gro ba dag la sems snyoms rtsva shing bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-24: rmi lam bzhin du chos rnams stong rtog cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:350b-25: 'jig rten rjes su mthun 'jug chu dang 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-2: khyod kyis sems can byang chub lung yang bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-3: sems can mang po mtha' yas khyod kyis btul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-4: byang chub mchog rab tu ni bdag lung ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-5: drang srong chen po bden bzhed shes rab mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-6: bdag ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'thab rtsod che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-7: sangs rgyas byang chub lung ston dgos ched la; ;sems can brgya dag zhi bde'i lam du 'khod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-9: gang gi tshe mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-10: de na 'dug pa de'i mod la lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-13: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-16: bdag gis srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-17: de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che dgu dag yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can yang bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351a-19: gdul sla ba dag yongs su bzung lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-0: gang dag skar ma skyong la sogs pa bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong rtsa bzhi po @351b 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bzang por lung bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-1: skyes bu dam pa de dag gis kyang 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-3: nga rgyal spyod pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar bgyid lags mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-4: 'on kyang de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-5: rtsod pa'i dus kyi snyigs ma dag yongs su spangs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-7: de dag gis kyang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-8: dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-9: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang; log par lta ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-10: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-13: dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-14: bram zer mi 'dzin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-15: bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyid pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-16: bsod nams ma lags pa bgyid pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-17: 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-18: legs par spyod pa gsum bo dag don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-21: 'byor ba dag la brtson pa rnams nyes par spyod pa gsum po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:351b-22: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang bral ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis spangs pa @352a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-2: mkhas pa thams cad kyis bor ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-3: srid pa'i btson rar chud pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-4: rgyun phyogs su 'das pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-5: 'gyur byed kyi chu klung du nub pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-6: 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-7: gti mug gi mun pa dang ma bral ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-8: mi dge ba'i bgyi ba thams cad ma btang ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-10: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-11: lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-12: nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa rnams spangs lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-13: de'i tshe na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na mi'i tshe lo bcu thub par 'gyur ba thams cad skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa 'di dag gis spangs shing bor bas de'i tshe srid pa'i dpa' klong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-14: 'khor ba'i 'khrul 'khor na skyob pa ma mchis pa dang; skyabs ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-15: dpung gnyen ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-16: sdug bsngal gyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag spangs nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzang dgu yongs su bzung zhing shin tu dul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-17: bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352a-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352b-0: sangs rgyas mang po la @352b lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa'i 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung ba de lta bu ma lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352b-3: de bzhin te; sems can bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam 'debs par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'ang yongs su bzung pa rnams ngas kyang de nyid du lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352b-8: shing kang ku sha'i 'dab ma bzhin du snying 'dar zhing bdag gi yid ni shin tu skyo la bdag gi lus thams cad ni sha thang bar gyur cing mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352b-10: gal te de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spangs shing rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi mun par 'phangs te thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa'i sems can rnams bdag gi snying rje'i gnas su 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:352b-12: bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+g'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po de la skye dgu'i tshe lo stong thub pa na sdod cing bdag yun ring po de srid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353a-1: gis ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yun ring pos smin par bgyi 'tshal ba'i 'dul ba rnams yongs su 'dzin pa la spro bar bgyi zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na 'dul ba rnams yongs su gzung bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353a-2: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dngos po'i mtshan ma yongs su btang ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so zhes thos pas bdag gis de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353a-3: ji ltar tshe rabs gzhan dag na slong mo ba'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag mchis par 'gyur na'ang de dag la yongs su gtong ba 'di lta bu dag yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353a-7: bza' ba dang; bca' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353a-17: na ba'i gsos sman gyi sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353b-0: sa le sbram gyi sbyin pa thams cad yang dang yang du yongs su gtong ba na bdag kyang 'di @353b ltar mchog tu dga' zhing snying rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar sems can rnams la stsal nas sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353b-1: 'dul bas sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du btang ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353b-2: gal te yang btang bar dka' ba slong ba'i sems can dag mchis nas 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353b-11: lag pa yongs su btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353b-12: rkang pa yongs su btang ba dang; rna ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353b-21: mgo yongs su btang ba de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba dag slong bar bgyid na'ang mchog tu dga' zhing snying rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar 'dul ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353b-22: bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyad par bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:353b-23: gang sngon chad nam yang sems can gang gis kyang de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang bar ma gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-0: slad chad kyang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa gang yang de lta bu'i yongs su @354a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-1: gtong ba yongs su gtong bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu yongs su gtong ba dag yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-2: gang dag tshe rabs gzhan na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-3: bdag gis slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang yongs su gtong ba'i tshul gyi yon tan la 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-4: nyon mongs pa'i g-yul rab tu zhi ba gang lags pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-5: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-6: de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na rtag par tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs sna tshogs kyi dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-7: ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yul rnams la mi bzod pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-8: bdag la so sor rtog pa'i bar gang lags pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-9: bdag de lta bu'i bzod pa sgom par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354a-10: ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad dben pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-0: 'dus ma byas thams cad zhi bar sgom pa la brtson zhing bla na med pa'i spyod pa las slar mi ldog pa gang @354b lags pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-1: 'du byed thams cad la phyin ci log spang ba'i slad du stong pa nyid la spyod pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-2: rang bzhin gyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-3: gang dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-4: grangs ma mchis pa dag tu spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis spyod pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-5: ji ltar sngan chad byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa lags kyang de ltar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la ma spyad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-6: slad kyis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba dag kyang de ltar spro ba brtsan pa'i stobs kyi shugs kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu la bdag spyod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-8: slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang tshul gyi yon tan la 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:354b-9: bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas kyang slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'grub par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-0: bla na med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das @355a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-1: pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du 'dzin par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag sbyin pa la rlom sems ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig; tshul khrims la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-2: bzod pa la rlom sems ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-3: brtson 'grus la blang ba ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-4: bsam gtan rnams la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-5: shes rab la gnyis su ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-6: sems can 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad bor ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-8: dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-9: 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-10: log par lta ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-11: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-12: 'grogs shing nyam nga ba thob pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-13: lam ngan pas bcom par gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-14: bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bzhag pa'i slad du bskal ba chen po bcur yang sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la spro bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355a-15: de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355b-0: gnod sbyin dbul po @355b rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355b-1: mi dbul po rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la'ang spro bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355b-2: ji ltar sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon 'jog pa ltar sems can thams cad la'ang de bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355b-3: chad pa stong pa lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355b-4: sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba de lta bu dag yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355b-5: bdag gis srid pa tha ma pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du skye ba gcig gis thogs shing dga' ldan gyi gnas na dus la sdod cing mchis pa ma gtogs par bskal pa'i mtha'i bar du'ang lha'i bde ba skye ba dag don du mi gnyer bar bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas bdag sangs rgyas re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355b-6: sangs rgyas re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yon tan dag rtogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:355b-8: de bzhin du bdag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-0: de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsam pa @356a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-1: ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-2: 'jig rten na sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis na'ang bdag gi drang srong gi brtul zhugs kyis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-4: mngon par shes pa dag la'ang sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-5: bdag gis sems can lta ba la chags shing dbang phyug chen po la dad pa rnams dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis dge ba rnams la sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-6: bdag gis sems can sred med kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-9: tshangs pa'i bar dag la dad pa rnams kyang tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis dge ba'i chos rnams la sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-10: de bzhin du nam mkha' lding rnams la'ang nam mkha' lding gi gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-11: brgya byin gyi bar la'ang brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi sa dge ba'i spyod pa dag la sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-12: sems can ltogs pa rnams la'ang rang gi sha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-13: khrag gis tshim par bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356a-14: sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la'ang rang gi lus dang srog gis yongs su skyob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-0: bdag yun ring po de srid du sems kyi rgyud tshig cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa rnams kyi don du stobs po che'i @356b shugs kyis spyad pa spyod pa ni bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sems can rnams kyi slad du gtum pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-2: mi bzad pa sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal dag nod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-3: bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+g'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas lhag ma bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-4: bskal pa bzang po la thug pa na gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bgyi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i dus na bdag gis 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag mthong par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-6: bdag gis sems can sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-7: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-8: nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong par bor ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-10: mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-11: dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:356b-12: lam ngan pa'i bar gyis bcom pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-1: thob pa gang dag dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can de dag bdag gis dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du stsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du stsol la 'dul zhing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-3: bdag gis sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon de'ang bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog cing ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-4: shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs la sbyor bar yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'bul bar yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-6: de'i tshe na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'ang thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-9: bzod pa dag kyang thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-10: sa non par yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-11: bdag gis sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam yang dag par 'dzin du stsol cing slob tu stsol par yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357a-12: de dag kyang ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang 'dzin par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-0: gang gi tshe bskal @357b pa bzang po la bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-1: rgyal ba nyi ma 'khor ba 'jig shar ba de'i tshe bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-3: de'i tshe na bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lags pa'i drung du mchi bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-4: mchis nas kyang mchod pa sna tshogs bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-5: zhu ba yongs su zhu bar yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-6: rab tu 'byung bar yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-9: ting nge 'dzin dag la mngon par brtson par yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-10: chos kyi mchog ston par yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-11: de'i tshe na sems can gang dag sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-12: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-13: lta ba'i lam du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-14: mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-15: lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-16: nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa'i sems can de dag la'ang chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:357b-17: bdag 'dul ba de dag kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-0: rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub pa de'i tshe na bdag lhun gyis grub pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad @358a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-2: skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya bar gyur gyi bar du sems can rnams bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-3: dus de la bab pa na lha'i 'jig rten du mchis nas lha rnams la chos ston par 'gyur zhing 'dul ba rnams kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-4: sems can rnams kyi tshe lo brgya nyi shu pa'i bar du gyur pa na bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-7: gzugs kyi dregs pas myos shing ser sna can du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-8: snyigs ma lnga'i mun par chud pa'i sems can 'dod chags bdo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-15: chos ma lags pa la 'dod chags kyis chags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-16: chos ma lags pa'i longs spyod 'tshol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-18: phyin ci log tu mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-19: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-24: bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-25: bsod nams ma lags pa bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-26: 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi blta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-27: bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mi brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358a-28: theg pa gsum don du mi gnyer ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-0: legs par spyod pa gsum la mi brtson @358b pa; nyes par spyod pa gsum la brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-1: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-2: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-3: phyin ci log bzhi nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-4: rgud pa bzhi la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-5: bdud bzhi'i dbang du mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-7: sgrib pa lnga'i dbang du mchis pa'i sems can dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-8: dbang po drug gi dregs pas myos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-9: log pa brgyad la zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-10: 'dod pa'i nyam nga ba thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-11: bag la nyal kun nas slong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-13: 'byor pa don du mi gnyer ba phyin ci log gi lta ba can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-15: mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa; khva ltar mu cor smra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-26: ser sna can; phan tshun mi snyan pa brjod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-27: gcig la gcig mi gus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-28: le lo can dbang po ma tshang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-31: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-32: bsam spa dang dran pa'i snying po nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-33: nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:358b-35: mdog ngan pa mi sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-2: gang dag snga dro gcig la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa mang du spyod pa de dag la bstod cing ther zug tu blta ba'i sems can dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-3: phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-4: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'chums pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-15: chos ma lags pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-16: khyad par la mi gnas pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-17: phan tshun nongs pa rtsom pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-19: gcig la gcig gsod pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-20: chos yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-22: chos rnams la nongs par brtson pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-23: mi dge ba skyed pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-24: mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba mi 'tshol ba'i sems dang; sbyin gnas ma lags pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359a-26: 'ching ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-0: 'chi ba la yid rton @359b pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-1: kun tu sbyor ba thams cad kyis gnas pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-2: sgrib pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-3: chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgyel bar bgyi ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-4: lta ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyi ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-5: phan tshun mi snyan pa rjod pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-6: gcig gis gcig bza' ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-7: phan tshun 'tshe ba la dbang bgyid pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-8: zhe sdang yang dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-9: gcig la gcig kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-10: 'dod pa dag gis ngoms mi myong ba'i sems dang; thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing 'jungs pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-11: byas pa mi bzo ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-12: gzhan gyi chung ma brnab pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-13: gnod sems kyis 'tshe ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-14: smon lam ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can dag kyang de'i tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-15: der sgra 'di lta bu dag phan tshun thos par yang bgyid de; sems can dmyal ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-16: dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-17: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:359b-23: rtag tu sgra bgyid pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-6: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-8: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-9: brdzun du smra ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-14: phrag dog dang ser sna'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-15: kun tu 'dzin pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-18: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-19: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-20: sdug pa dang bral ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-22: gcig gis gcig 'khol zhing 'tsho ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-23: mngal na gnas pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-27: bkres pa dang skom pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-28: ngal ba dang chad pa tshol ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-30: bzo'i las sna tshogs kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-31: nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sgra dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-32: sems can de dag gcig la gcig sgra de lta bu dag thos par yang bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-33: de'i tshe na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360a-34: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-0: sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de lta bu dag gis kun tu gtam par @360b 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-1: sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa dag gis stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bor bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-5: yang dag par sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-6: dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-7: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral zhing mi dge ba dang 'grogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-8: mun khrod nas mun khrod du mchi ba'i sems can de dag ni de'i tshe na las kyi rkyen rab tu dam pos bskal pa bzang po la lo brgya nyi shu pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-9: sems can de dag gis las kyi rkyen gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad kyis yongs su spangs shing dman par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-10: sa gzhi pa tshva can du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-19: gdug pa dag gis kun tu gtam par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-20: dus ma lags par rdul gyis 'khrigs pa'i bser ma ldang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-21: dus ma lags par ro ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-23: mi bsil ba'i char pa 'bab par 'gyur zhing; de ltar sa la lo thog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:360b-32: sems can rnams kyi bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361a-2: nye bar spyod pa rnams kyang ngan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361a-7: sems can de dag gis 'tshal nas kyang slar zhing rgya cher rtsub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361a-13: gshe ba dang; gcig la gcig mi gus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361a-14: 'jigs pa'i sems kyis kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361a-15: gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sha 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361a-17: ri dvags kyi pags pa 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361a-19: srog chags 'gums pa la brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361a-33: brtul zhugs ngan pa rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par brtson par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361a-34: bdag 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361b-0: dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs rgyud khyad par du 'phags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal @361b po'i rigs su btsun mo dam pa'i khong du mngal na gnas pa nye bar 'dzin par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361b-1: de'i tshe bdag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361b-2: steng du ni 'og min gyi gnas gyi bar gyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361b-3: 'og tu ni gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag kyang snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361b-4: de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361b-7: lha dang mi rnams su skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang snang ba de mthong zhing reg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361b-9: 'khor ba la rtog cing sdug bsngal gyis yid byung ba de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal zhing tha na nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyi ba de'i sems skyed par yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361b-10: dang por lam mchog gi sa bon 'di'ang skyed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:361b-11: gang gi tshe bdag chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad ston pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig gis bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar ston cing sems mnyam par bzhag nas zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362a-0: bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid thob nas yongs su skyo ba'i sems can gang dag 'khor ba las @362a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362a-1: yongs su thar bar bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gis bdag zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na nor bu'i snying po yang dag par ston pa la sems mnyam par bzhag nas skyil mo krung gis mchis pa mthong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362a-2: zla ba bcu po 'das nas bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa rnam pa drug tu g-yo bar bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362a-3: steng du ni 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362a-4: 'og tu ni gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g-yo bar bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362a-5: de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba rnams dang mi rnams su skyes par gyur pa de dag kyang rab tu sad par bgyid par gyur cig ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362a-7: bdag ma'i mchan khung g-yas pa nas mngon par 'byung ba'i tshe'ang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362a-8: de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad thams cad kyi sems can rnams la'ang yang dag par skul bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la mya ngan @362b las 'das pa'i sa bon 'debs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-1: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu skyed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-2: gang gi tshe bdag gi rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa la reg par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa gzhi gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-5: de'i tshe na bdag gis gang dag skye gnas bzhir gtogs shing 'gro ba lnga la brten pa'i sems can chu la brten pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-6: sa la brten pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-7: nam mkha' la brten pa de dag thams cad rab tu sad par bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-8: sems can gang dag gi rgyud la ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu ma skyes pa rnams kyang skyed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu brtan par gyur pa rnams ni theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-10: bdag btsas ma thag tu de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de'i tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-16: klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-17: lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:362b-18: brdzus te skyes pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363a-1: yin rdzu 'phrul chen po thams cad kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mchis par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363a-2: bdag btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363a-3: bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gang lags pa de theg pa gsum po dag gis rab tu dang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363a-4: 'khor de na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can srid pa tha ma par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag bdag gis 'dul bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363a-5: de na gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis rnam par snang byed me tog gi bzod pa thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363a-6: de nas gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po par gyur ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'khrugs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363a-7: ting nge 'dzin des sa gsum po dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363a-8: gang gi tshe bdag khrus bgyid par 'tshal ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363a-9: de na klu'i rgyal po chen po khyad par du 'phags pa gang dag mchis par gyur pa de dag bdag la khrus bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-0: sems can gang dag gis bdag 'khrur bar mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis theg pa @363b gsum po dag gis ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de lta bu dag mngon par rtogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-1: sems can gang dag gis bdag shing rta la 'tshal ba mthong bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-2: rgya cher bgyid na sems can gang dag gis bdag gzhon nu rtse ba dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-5: skad sna tshogs ston pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-7: bud med rnams kyi gnas su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-8: rtsed mos yid byung nas dgung phyed na mngon par byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-9: rgyan lhab lhub spangs nas yang dang yang du gos dmar po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-10: chos gos ngur smig yongs su 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-11: byang chub kyi shing drung du nye bar bgrod pa'i slad du mchi ba mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la'ang bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag bar bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ci nas kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis sems can de dag 'dun pa drag cing brtson par gyur pa de ltar chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-12: de na gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis rnam par snang byed me tog gi ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:363b-13: gang dag gis theg pa chen po'i sa bon btab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'khrugs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-1: po dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-2: bdag nyid kyis stan bting ba bsdus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-3: byang chub kyi shing dung du rdo rje'i gdan bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcas nas lus drang por bsrang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-4: mchis nas bdag dbugs 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-5: dbugs rdub pa nye bar zhi ba de lta bu'i mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan sgom par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-6: bdag gdugs la lan gcig bsam gtan las ldang bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-7: langs nas kyang bras su til gyi 'bras bu phyed cig 'tshal bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-8: phyed ni slong mo pa la stsol bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-9: gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du gtogs pa'i 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi lha ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mchi bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-10: de dag thams cad kyang bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba de srid du yun ring por bdag de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-12: de na gang dag gis nyan thos kyi theg pa par sa bon btab par gyur par de dag gi rgyud la nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364a-13: ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang lags pa dag kyang bdag gis 'dul ba'i srid pa tha mar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-9: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-10: gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag gi bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-11: gling bzhi pa de na gzhan mu stegs can brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ngan pa'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa gang lags pa de dag la'ang mi ma lags pa dag gis khyed cag dka' ba byed pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-12: ji ltar phyogs 'di na byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-13: snying la yid la byed pa 'dogs shing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-14: dag gi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-16: dbugs rdub pa dag rab tu zhi pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-17: nyin gcig bzhin du lan re bsam gtan las langs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-18: zas su til gyi 'bras bu phyed za zhing de ltar bsam gtan sgom pa'i dka' ba spyad pa de ni mthu che ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-19: de ni 'bras bu che ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:364b-20: de ni rgya che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-0: de ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang @365a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-2: gal te yid mi ches na deng la nyid kyis ltos shig ces bsgo bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-3: de dag gis kyang dka' ba spyod pa de btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-4: bdag dka' ba spyod pa mthong nas gang dag gis sems kyi rgyud la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu gnas par 'gyur ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-9: khyim na gnas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-10: rab tu byung ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-11: grong khyim dang bcas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur zhing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-12: bud med gang bdag blta ba'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur ba de'ang de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma thob par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-13: gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-15: bya gang dag gis bdag dka' ba spyod cing mchis pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang de dag gi dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus kyi tha ma thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365a-17: bya gang dag nyan thos kyi theg par sa bon btab par gyur pa dag kyang bdag gis 'dul ba skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-0: gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa pa @365b dag gi bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-1: tshul de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas phra mo dag la'ang brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-2: de bzhin du yi dvags rnams la'ang brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-3: ji srid du sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du 'gyur zhing ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur ba dpag tu ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-4: grangs ma mchis pa de dag gis sems kyi rgyud la thar pa'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur pa'i yun ring po de srid du bdag skyil mo krung gcig gis de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig /
