K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-5: ji ltar sngon chad sems can du bgrang ba gzhan mu stegs can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-6: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-8: bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po pa sus kyang sngon de lta bu'i dka' ba ma spyad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-9: slan chad kyang sems can du bgrang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-10: gzhan mu stegs can su'ang ji ltar bdag spyod par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod par rngo mi thogs pa de lta bu'i dka' ba spyod pa bdag spyod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:365b-11: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob pa de'i tshe skyes bu'i rtsal bgyid cing bdud dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa pham par bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-0: las kyi 'bras bu'i lhag ma dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bdud las rgyal zhing bla na med pa yang dag par @366a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-2: ci nas kyang bdag sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dgra bcom pa nyid 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-3: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-4: de bzhin du gsum pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-5: de bzhin du bzhi pa la'ang chos ston par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-6: sems kyi rgyud la'ang dgra bcom pa nyid 'jog par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-7: sems can gcig gi don gyi slad du'ang bdag cho 'phrul 'bum phrag du ma ston par 'gyur zhing de'i sems kyi rgyud la yang dag pa'i lta ba 'jog par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-9: tshig 'bru stong phrag mang po dag kyang brjod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-10: ji ltar rdo thogs pa'i 'bras bu la'ang 'jog par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-11: sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa'i ri bo dag ye shes kyi rdo rjes 'joms par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-12: theg pa rnam gsum rnam par dgod pas chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-13: sems can gcig gi don du chos stan cing mi 'jigs pa'i go 'phang la rab tu dgod pa'i slad du'ang bdag dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dag tu sug pas mchi bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-14: bdag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dag dgag pa ma mchis par 'gyur zhing nyam chung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366a-18: spyi brtol can gyi sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-1: nyon mongs pa mang pos dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-2: bud med kyang bdag gis bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-3: bdag la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-6: dge bsnyen ma dag mchis par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-7: skye bo mang po dag gis bdag gi bstan pa rgyas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-8: lha rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-12: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i bar dag kyang tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-14: bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis bdag la mtshon cha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-17: lag cha rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis 'debs su mchi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-19: brlang po dag gis gshe zhing spyo bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-20: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu'ang mi snyan pa'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:366b-21: dug dang 'dres pa'i bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:367a-0: btung ba dag stobs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su ma bas pa la gnas nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya @367a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:367a-2: bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can dag sngon gyi 'khon gyis 'gum pa'i yo byad kyi sbyor bas bdag la tshig rtsub po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:367a-4: dug dang 'dres pa'i btung ba dag stsol bar 'gyur zhing /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:377b-22: 'phags pa'i gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:377b-25: tshangs par spyod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:377b-26: zhal ta bgyid pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:377b-28: nang du yang dag 'jog gi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:377b-29: tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:377b-33: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sgra dang; ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:377b-34: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:377b-35: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:377b-36: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-1: gyi skye mched kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-2: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-3: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-4: smon pa ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-5: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-6: nyan thos kyi sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-8: theg pa chen po'i gtam pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' dag gi sgra dag me tog de dag las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-9: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis thos par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-10: rang rang gis sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-11: sems can chen po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad la smon pa ma mchis par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-12: de dag de nas babs te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-13: de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang thos par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-14: de dag kyang sred pa'i kun tu byor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-17: yid bde ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378a-18: de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gis sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-0: de dag lha'i 'jig rten nas babs nas @378b 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-2: me tog de dag kyang nam mkha' la rin po che sna tshogs dag tu 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-17: de lta bu'i rin po che'i char dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du mngon par rab tu 'bab par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad 'thab mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-24: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-25: tshig rtsub cing bslang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-26: dug rnams thams cad kyi thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-27: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-32: 'ching ba dag ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-33: lo legs pa dag kun tu gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-34: sems can gang dag gis rin po che de dag mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:378b-37: yongs su spyod pa'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-0: sku gdung de dag kyang slar gser @379a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-1: gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas par gyur cig ///
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-4: de bzhin du mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na'ang de dag nor bu rin po che aanda rnyil dag tu kun nas gnas par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-5: de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-7: me tog manda ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-8: manda ra ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-9: pa ri ya tra ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-10: me tog 'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-11: me tog gi char de dag las kyang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-15: sgra yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-16: yang sku gdung de dag kyang slar 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du kun tu gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-17: de bzhin du gang gi tshe mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na'ang sku gdung de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gyen du 'phags nas me tog gi char gyi bar du sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379a-18: nad kyi bskal pa bar ma'i bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379b-0: ji ltar bskal pa chen po bzang po la bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams ston pa'i mdzad pa @379b bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379b-1: 'dul ba bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379b-2: de bzhin du bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag byung gi bar du'ang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379b-3: bdag gi sku gdung rnams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379b-4: bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379b-5: gang dag bdag gis dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing rab tu bkod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379b-6: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa de dag slad kyis gang gi tshe bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gangg'a'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed 'das nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379b-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sha stag tu gyur te 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:379b-8: bdag byang chub thob nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-0: gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pas bla na med pa @380a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang slad kyis bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+g'a'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed byung zhing 'das par gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-2: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-3: grangs ma mchis pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di skad du gang yun ring po na bskal pa bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-4: bskal pa bzang po de dag la bab pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-5: rgyal ba nyi ma bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa des bdag cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-6: bdag cag ni sems kyi rgyud tshig pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-7: mi dge ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa mtshams med pa byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-8: log par lta ba'i bar du gyur pa yin na des bdag cag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pas na de'i phyir bdag cag da ltar thams cad mkhyen par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380a-9: rnam pa thams cad du chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyis 'khor lo bskor la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-0: 'gro ba'i 'khor lo zlog cing sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la @380b rab tu 'god par byed pa yin no zhes bdag gi bsngags pa brjod cing sgrogs la dbyangs kyang brjod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-1: gang dag byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las bdag gis bsngags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-3: snyan pa thos par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na de ltar rtsod pa'i dus la bab cing snyigs ma lnga byung bar gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces yongs su zhu bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-6: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-8: sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul 'di'ang ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-9: byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-10: rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-11: de dag kyang rgya chen po la mos par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-12: de dag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-13: de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su snyigs ma lnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:380b-14: nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-1: ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rab tu 'dzin par gyur pa de lta bu'i smon lam yang 'debs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-3: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-4: nyon mongs pa bdo ba'i rtsod pa'i dus su smon lam btab pa bzhin byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-5: rigs kyi bu mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du de lta bu'i lung bstan pas lung ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag kyang sems can byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-7: rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'di skad du yun ring po 'di srid cig na rgyal ba nyi ma mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams kyi don de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-8: rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-9: de'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pa dag gis nged cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381a-10: nged cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pas dang po sems bskyed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-0: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag la brtson par @381b byas so zhes bdag gi sku gdung gi rnam par 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi tshul dag rgya cher ji ltar sngar smos pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-1: de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-3: mi dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po lnga brgya po de dag btab nas des 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-5: gal te de ltar bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-7: snyigs ma bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa na 'jig rten ldongs shing 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-8: yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-9: lta ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mun par chud pa'i 'jig rten na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-10: sngar smos pa lta bu'i bar dag la bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-11: gal te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad sgrub par rngo thogs pa lta na byang chub kyi slad du smon pa spang bar mi bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang zhing gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar mi bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-14: de ni bdag gi nges pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-15: yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:381b-16: nyan thos kyi theg pa'ang mi 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-1: dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid kyang mi 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-2: lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug kyang mi 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-3: 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyi longs spyod kyang mi 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-10: nam mkha' lding du skye ba'ang mi 'tshal la dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar yang mi bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-11: gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-12: tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-13: thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-14: bsgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-15: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pas ni re ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-17: gang bdag gis kyang spyin pa las byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-18: tshul khrims las byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-19: thos pa las byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-20: bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dag bsgrubs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382a-21: gal te bdag gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-0: de'i slad du bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba mnar med par rab tu rtsub cing drag pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i @382b sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi slad du bsngo bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba des de dag de nas ldang bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mi 'thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur zhing mchog nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-3: sems can de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu yongs su ma bas par gyur na'ang de'i slad du bdag gum nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-4: bdag gi lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang mi rtsol ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-5: bdag gi lus re re'i tshad kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-6: bdag gi lus re res kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig bu 'dis bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-7: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-8: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-9: bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal ba ba'i sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa mi bzad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag myong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:382b-10: da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-0: mnar med pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba'i @383a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-1: las yang dag par gsog par 'gyur ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-2: sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu mtshams ma mchis pa'i las kyis 'phen par 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-3: kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi don du bdag las des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bdag gi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-4: sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-5: 'khor ba las brgal bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-6: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid kyis bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las kun nas bslang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-9: myong bar 'gyur bar nges pas sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383a-10: de bzhin du tsha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-0: yang @383b sos kyi bar dag la'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-1: de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dag la'ang brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-2: de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten la'ang brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-3: de bzhin du gnod sbyin dbul po la'ang brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-4: de bzhin du grul bum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-7: nam mkha' lding dag la'ang brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-8: gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sems can rnams sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-10: gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du 'on pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-13: lag pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-14: rkang pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-15: dran pa rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-16: mi gtsang ba za ba rnams la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-17: ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du'ang bdag sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa dag tu skye bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-18: gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-19: 'khor bar sems can rnams yun ring po ji srid du khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:383b-21: phung po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384a-4: srin po rnams su mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384a-5: ji ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i bar gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gi dpang du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384a-6: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384a-7: grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384a-8: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis dpang du 'gyur zhing ye shes su 'gyur bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384a-10: bdag gis ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag sgrub par rngo thogs shing bdag bskal ba bzang po la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ba lta na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384a-12: de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-0: lha ma yin du @384b bcas pa'i 'jig rten sa dang nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa de dag thams cad mchi ma rab tu 'dzag bzhin du yan lag ldas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-1: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis dran pa zab mo thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-2: sems can zab mo rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-3: smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-5: lhag pa'i bsam pa des sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-6: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-7: ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam des na sems can rnams kyi sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-9: dpung gnyen du gyur par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-10: sems can rnams sdug bsngal las rab tu thar bar bya ba'i smon lam btab pa de bzhin du khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-12: rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa nyid kyang du zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-13: ae ma'i mchog tu zab pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-14: khyod ni bde la mi gnas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-15: khyod ni sems can snying rje ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-16: khyod ni bdag gi mtshon ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:384b-17: de bzhin du sbyar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-1: pa dag la khyod ma chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-2: dbang po rta thul rnams las dbang rta thul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-3: dbang po 'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-4: gzungs dang ye shes kyi ni mdzod du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-5: de bzhin du sbyar te mthu chen thob kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-6: sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-7: dge ba'i don du kun nas 'das pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-8: mchog tu dka' ba'i sdug bsngal chen po yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-9: khyod ni snying rje la ni ngu bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-12: mkhas pa dang ni shes rab mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-13: phreng ba dri dang byug pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-14: de phyir khyod la mchod par 'os //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-15: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-16: snying rje chen pos sems can la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-17: de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-18: khyod ni dus 'di zad nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-19: mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-21: ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-22: de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-23: khyod kyis sems can 'jigs med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-24: byang chub spyod pa dag kyang bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed shugs kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-27: sems can la brtse gzhan med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385a-28: gang phyir shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-0: khyod ni yon @385b tan kun dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-1: spos kyi seng ges smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-2: khyod ni ma 'ongs dus na ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-3: bzang la nyon mongs bdud kyi tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-4: sems can sdug bsngal sgrol byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-5: khyod kyi grags dang snyan pa 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-6: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-7: skye ba'i dgon par brtson gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-8: log sgyus shin tu nyam nga ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-9: sha za ba dang khrag 'thung ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-10: sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-12: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs chud cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-13: nyon mongs 'dam du byin gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-14: mtshams med pa dag byed pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-15: sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-16: spos kyi glang pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-18: ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-19: dam pa'i chos ni spong byed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-20: sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-21: rin po che tog gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-22: ye shes tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-23: snying rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-25: sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-26: 'jigs dang gdung bral gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-27: khyod kyis ngan song gsum lam du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-28: sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-29: chang ba stong 'drar gnas gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-30: sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung ba gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-31: lag na autpa las smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-32: khyod kyi snying rje ye shes dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:385b-34: skye dang 'chi bas gzir gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-2: ye shes grags pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-3: nad mang dag gis nyen pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-4: nyon mongs rlung gis ded pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-5: ye shes chu yis zhi byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-6: bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-7: gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-8: ji ltar khyod ni nyi ma bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-9: nyon mongs dra ba rab bcom ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-10: nyon mongs zad cing rnam thar pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-11: brtson 'grus brtan pa nged la med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-12: autpa la zla bas kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-13: ji ltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-14: brtson 'grus brtan pa yang dag mos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-15: srid pa'i 'ching bas rab bsdams pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-16: khams gsum po dag grol bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-17: dri med dbang pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-19: snying rje chen po dag bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-20: snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-21: khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-22: stobs chen shugs 'chang gis kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-23: nyon mongs ldan pa'i rtsod dus tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-24: byang chub gang dag khyod la rten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-25: khyod kyis nyon mongs brtsad nas bcad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-27: skar ma skyong gis kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-28: ye shes mdzod dang mtshungs 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-29: dri med smon lam btab pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-30: byang chub spyod phyir sems can gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386a-31: sman dang rten du khyod 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs yang dag par ston pa ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag @386b lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-1: kye ma shes sgron sems can rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-2: nyon mongs nad rnams rnam par bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-3: khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-4: sems can sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-6: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-9: mi dang bcas pa dag gis kyang bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-10: tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-12: gang gi tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-13: de nas de'i mod la sa cher g-yos par gyur cing phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi sa'ang g-yos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-21: kun tu rab tu ldeg cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:386b-22: kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur gyi bar du gyur nas yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-0: yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag tu'ang snang ba chen po byung bar gyur @387a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-1: cing me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-3: me tog manda ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-4: me tog manda ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-5: manda ra ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-6: 'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi me tog gi char de lta bu dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sa g-yos pa de mthong nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-9: 'jig rten du sa cher g-yos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-10: me tog gi char chen po'ang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-11: rkyen ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-12: yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bsags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che bsags pa de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po chen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387b-0: byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag @387b gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387b-2: zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387b-4: 'jig rten du sa chen po g-yos shing me tog gi char chen po dag rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:387b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:393b-0: rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod @393b de; de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:393b-2: gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:393b-3: de na byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:393b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:393b-5: ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:393b-6: 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:393b-7: gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394a-1: cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394a-2: sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig bu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394a-3: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394a-7: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa bya ba spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag ldas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa'ang rjod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394a-8: sems can chen po de'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394a-9: gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394a-10: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chen po rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394a-12: kun tu rab tu g-yos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394b-0: me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta @394b bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394b-2: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul bstan to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394b-8: gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:394b-10: gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395a-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395a-2: sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395a-3: yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395a-6: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395a-8: khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395a-11: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'ang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog der deng la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri bar mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395b-0: me tog zla ba ma dog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag @395b kyang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395b-1: skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu sgras gang bar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395b-2: snying rje chen po'i sgra'ang rab tu thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395b-4: de'i phyir na khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la'ang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395b-6: de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal ba grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395b-7: grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:395b-9: de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdozgs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod @396a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396a-2: de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su bzung ba dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396a-3: 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang snying rje'i 'od zer dag gis kun tu bkab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396a-4: gang dag khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396a-5: de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas khyod nyid las brtsams shing bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396a-7: skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396b-0: @396b de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis lags so zhes bgyi ba spring zhig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396b-5: de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyed cag deng la der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'ang nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396b-8: gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de las me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i dzambu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal du lhags te phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:396b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399a-17: thugs thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag gcig bu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @399b pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-1: bram ze chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa rnams la phan pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-2: 'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-8: me tog gi shing phun sum tshogs pa zhig kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-14: sman gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-15: de la me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni dpag tshad brgyar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-16: kha cig gis ni dpag tshad nyis brgyar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-17: kha cig gis ni dpag tshad sum brgyar lhang nge lhan ner byed cing de bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-18: de na me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhang nge lhan ner byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-19: de na sems can gang dag mig med pa de dag gis me tog de'i dri bsnams na ni mig dag thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:399b-20: 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna ba dag thob par 'gyur yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyis ni yan lag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-0: de na sems can gang dag nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi po dag gis @400a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-1: gces par gyur pa de dag gis dri bsnams na ni nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-2: de na sems can gang dag myos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-7: sems rnam par g-yengs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-8: dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis me tog de dag gi dri bsnams na ni dran pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-9: me tog gi shing de'i nang nas padma dkar po mkhrang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-16: ze ba mu tig dmar po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-17: 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhin stong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-18: rgyar ni dpag tshad 'bum yod pa gcig cig skyes par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-19: padma dkar po de'i kha dog dang dris phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu khyab cing lhang nge lhan ner 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400a-21: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi gang dag lus mi mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-0: dran pa @400b rab tu nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-1: sems rnam par g-yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis padma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsnams na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing dran pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring po ma lon zhing lus ma zhig pa de dag gi ro la padma dkar po de'i 'od zer dag gis phog gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-3: dris reg na ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang po 'thob par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-4: yang phyis langs te mdza' bshes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-5: snag gi gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal du zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-6: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-7: gang dag yang de nas shi 'phos par 'gyur pa de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-8: de dag der tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-9: de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-11: me tog gi shing de ji lta bar theg pa chen po'i 'dus pa 'di'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:400b-12: ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba nye bar gnas pa'i dus na me tog de dag kha bye zhing rab tu rgyas bar gyur nas lhang nge lhan ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401a-0: @401a *// shing kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401a-1: kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur nas sems can mang po de dag gi nad sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa de ltar ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401a-2: ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i 'od zer dag gis me tog de dag kha phye zhing lam me lhang nge lhan ner gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401a-3: nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar ni skyes bu dam pa nga 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401a-4: thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis sems can rnams la khyab par mdzad cing kha phye nas yang dang yang du sems can rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401a-5: khyod kyis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas nga la phul ba de dag thams cad kyis nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag yongs su bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401a-6: kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401a-7: kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa dag yongs su bzung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-0: rang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas @401b kyang lung bstan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-1: skyes bu dam pa gang dag gis nga'i thad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ba de dag gis ni 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung bas na de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste; de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-4: de dag ni snying rje chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba dag la 'jug pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 'tshol ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-6: gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni snying brtse ba spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-9: bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-10: gang dag ji ltar bdag nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:401b-13: bud med rnam par spangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-2: gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-3: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spangs pa theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-4: bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang tshe ring por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-5: yun ring du gnas shing bskal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-8: ces smon lam de lta bu 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni des na ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-9: bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa'ang ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-13: sor mo lnga las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-14: kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dag rab tu bkye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402a-15: 'od zer de dag tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i phyogs su dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-0: sangs rgyas kyi @402b zhing rnams snang bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-1: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can de na mi rnams ni tshe lo bcu pa mdog ngan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-4: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-5: khrun ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i khrun yang rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-8: mthe bo can gyi mi rnams kyi khru gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-9: sor bdun gyi tshad tsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-12: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:402b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med pa 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed @403a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403a-1: de; srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403a-2: sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403a-3: kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403a-4: kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag yongs su bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403a-5: de na sems can chen po des nga'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403a-6: der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang nga la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403a-8: nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403b-0: de na gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug @403b pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma lnga shin tu bdo zhing nyon mongs pa dang rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403b-1: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403b-2: sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403b-3: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam nga bar zhugs pa dag smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403b-4: 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes pho nyan btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403b-5: snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar ming btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403b-6: nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:403b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404a-0: des dang po bla na med @404a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404a-1: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir pho nya dag btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404a-2: des dang po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dgongs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba dag na sems can tshe ring ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404a-6: bsam pa yongs su dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404a-7: bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid thob nas sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-0: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe thung ngus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa @404b mang po lhag par mdzad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-2: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos ston pa la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-3: skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu ngan cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-4: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing smon lam khyad par can btab pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-6: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-7: dud 'gro'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-9: rang sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa shin tu dul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni me tog lta bu zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-11: gang dag shin tu dul ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni padma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:404b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag @405a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-2: sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-3: byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-4: byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-5: bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-6: des ni byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams zhes bya'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-7: padma dkar po lta bu'ang ma yin la sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-12: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-13: bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs su bzung ba lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par smon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405a-17: sems can bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-0: byang chub thob nas @405b nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-1: byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang mi ring /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-2: ha cang yang mi thung ba zhig bar mar sgrub par smon pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-3: bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-4: des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma dkar po lta bu rnams zhes bya'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-5: me tog lta bu rnams zhes mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes kyang bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-10: khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi nang du dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying rje padma dkar po lta bur skyes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-11: gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-12: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:405b-13: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406a-1: kyang btang nas khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406a-2: 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406a-3: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig 'das nas lhag ma bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing rga ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406a-4: 'chi ba mang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jig rten ldongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406a-6: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406a-7: sems can lam ngan pas bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406a-8: nyam nga ba chen po thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406a-12: ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te; 'gro ba'i 'khor lo ni bzlog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406a-15: nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcil te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406b-0: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing @406b mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu sgras khyab par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406b-1: khyod kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406b-2: dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang lhan cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406b-3: lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406b-4: de'i tshe ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur zhing bskal pa tshad med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406b-5: lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po dag byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406b-6: skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:406b-7: skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang lus las skyes pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mjed pa mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-0: sngar ji skad smos pa de bzhin du @407a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-1: yun ring por sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-3: de'i tshe na gnas grong zhes bya ba na bram ze zhig yod pa des 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-4: skyes bu dam pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-5: bdag kyang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-6: byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-7: grogs byed par gyur nas khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-8: khyod srid pa tha mar gyur pa na bdag khyod kyi phar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-10: bdag khyod kyis byang chub thob par sbyin bdag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-11: gzhan yang de na rgya mtsho'i lha mo shin tu dul ba'i blo zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-12: bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na bdag khyod skyed pa'i mar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-13: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407a-14: rgyu skar gyi lha mo chu lha spyod ces bya ba [?] kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-0: de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma @407b pa'i bar du gyur pa na bdag khyod la bsnun pa'i ma ma byed pa'i mar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-1: khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-2: brgya byin mu khyud can zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-3: gzhan yang brgya byin pha rol sems zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-4: kye snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dag ces bya ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-5: khyod kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-6: bdag cag shes rab dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-7: rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nyan thos zung du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-8: gzhan yang brgya byin spyad spyod lta mdzes tshogs zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-9: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang khyod de dang de dag ces bya ba nas srid pa tha ma'i bar du gyur pa'i bur gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-10: gzhan yang ri rtse'i lha mo des pa kingshu ka zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-11: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod kyi btsun mor gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-12: khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:407b-13: lha ma yin gyi dbang po mdzes spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408a-0: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na bdag kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod @408a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408a-1: la byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran nyid du gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408a-5: khyod kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408a-6: chos kyi bcud kyang 'thung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408a-7: 'chi ba med pa'ang rtogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408a-8: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar yang thob par gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408a-13: de na 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed ces bya ba gcig cig 'dug pa des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408a-15: bdag kyang khyod la yo byad mang po dag gis grogs byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408a-16: bdag bskal pa dpag tu med pa dag tu khyod la 'bras bu dang bcas par spyod cing nye bar 'tsho ba'i nye dur gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-0: rtag tu dngos po bslang ba'i don @408b du khyod kyi drung du nye bar 'gro bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-23: mgo dag slong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-25: bdag de ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi grogs su'ang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-28: bdag de ltar khyod byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi grogs su gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-29: nam khyod kyis byang chub thob pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi nyan thos kyi gnas thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-30: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'dzin par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-31: rjes su chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-32: khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:408b-36: skyes bu dam pa khyod nga'i bla na med pa'i spyod pa'i grogs su 'gyur pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:409a-0: @409a *// khyod tshe rabs khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du nga la dngos po slong ba'i phyir nam 'ongs pa de'i tshe ngas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sbyin par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:409a-1: khyod la'ang bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:409a-12: ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:409a-13: sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas sbyin pa rtsol par gyur na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:409b-3: gal te bdag gis slong mo pa la sems ma dad pas sbyin pa stsol tam /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:409b-5: gal te tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:409b-7: zas la ji lta ba de bzhin du slong mo pa gang dag bdag la gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:409b-8: mgo'i bar dag slong bar 'gyur zhing tshig 'jam po'am /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:410a-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
