K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:443b-9: de'i tshe na sems can rnams phal cher rtag par lta zhing 'khon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:443b-10: pha rol gnon pa dang bcas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:443b-11: 'thab pa la gnas pa dang bcas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-0: ngas sems can de dag pha rol gnon pa'i stobs chen po'i @444a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-1: shugs kyis phung po dgra lta bur gyur pa'i rab tu sbyor bas chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-2: skye mched grong stong pa lta bur so sor brtags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-3: rkyen gyis rjes su 'brel pa skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-4: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pa'ang bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-5: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par sbyar nas nga nyid kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-6: de'i tshe na sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang nga yis gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-7: de bzhin du sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang 'thab mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-9: khon du 'dzin pa dag spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-10: nags khrod na gnas shing nags khrod na rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za la bsam gtan sgom zhing tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444a-11: de nas gang gi tshe bskal pa de zad du nye ba na sbyin gnas de dag gis dzambu'i gling mtha' dag khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-0: rtsod pa de dag kyang rab tu zhi @444b bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-1: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-2: char pa dag kyang rab tu zhi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-3: sa la brten pa'i lo tog rnams kyang legs par smin cing dmangs dang ldan par gyur na dus kyi nyes pas nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa 'ba' zhig tu gyur nas de'i tshe nga 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-4: 'di ltar bdag gis sems can rnams kyi nad zhi bar byed ma nus so snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-5: de'i tshe ngas 'di snyam du bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-6: gang dag bdag gis brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-9: gzhan yang lha'i drang srong rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-11: brgya byin gyi drang srong rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-12: mi'i drang srong rnams kyang bsags la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-13: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir sman sbyar pa'i bstan bcos dag bstan par bya'o snyam nas de'i tshe nga rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-19: brgya byin gyi drang srong rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:444b-20: mi'i drang srong rnams la bsgo nas ri lan tshva'i bdag po gcig pa zhes bya ba lan tshva spyod pa'i rtse mor nges pa'i gnas zhes bya ba der bsdus nas 'byung po yang dag par zlog pa so so 'brang zhing bsrung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-0: bad kan rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i bstan @445a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-1: bcos dag rab tu bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-2: de bzhin du sbyar te sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-3: der ngas ji ltar smon lam chen po btab pa bzhin du nyi ma gcig la'ang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyis shes rab snang bar byas shing theg pa gsum po dag la nges par sbyar nas ngan song gi lam rnams ni bcad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-4: mtho ris kyi lam dag la ni rab tu bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-5: nad sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byas shing yongs su thar bar byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-6: de bzhin du sems can dpag tu med pa dag la ye shes kyi snang ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-7: bde ba la bkod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-8: rigs kyi bu; nga'i smon lam gyi re ba de yongs su rdzogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-9: gang gi tshe ngas nyi ma gcig la sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi ngan song gi lam rnams bkag cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-10: mtho ris kyi lam la rab tu bkod da /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-11: ngas nad pa rnams kyi yo byad kyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-12: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir lha'i drang srong rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445a-13: gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams lha'i 'jig rten lan tshva spyod pa'i rtse mor bsdus nas sems can rnams kyi nad med pa la mkhas pa rab tu bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445b-0: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing @445b rab rib can gyi gling thams cad du'ang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445b-1: sems can rnams kyang mtho ris kyi lam la rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445b-5: mi'i drang srong rnams kyang bsags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445b-6: de dag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir rig pa'i gnas sna tshogs dag rab tu bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab rib can 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu'ang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445b-8: sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum po dag la nges par sbyar cing mtho ris kyi lam la rab tu bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445b-9: rig pa'i gnas sna tshogs dag rab tu bshad nas nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445b-11: nga'i bla na med pa'i re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:445b-12: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab rib can gyi gling thams cad du ji ltar sngar smon lam btab pa bzhin du bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-0: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i gling thams cad du'ang ngas ji ltar sngon smon lam btab pa bzhin du skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag @446a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i legs par spyad pa gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon de la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-5: de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa las shin tu lhag pa snyed 'das pa na dus ngan pa'i tshe bskal pa chen po legs bcas zhes bya ba byung ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rnam rgyal sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-6: de'ang snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur nas shar phyogs logs su gling bzhi pa lnga bcu 'das pa na dzambu'i gling dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-7: der yang nga sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skyes nas gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-8: der yang ngas sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-9: theg pa gsum po dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-10: thams cad sbyin zhing kun la sbyin par yang gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446a-11: de nga'i gan du slong mo pa dag 'ongs nas 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-1: rin po che mthon ka chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-3: chu 'dang gi bar gyi rin po che sna tshogs slong bar byed pa'i slong mo pa rnams kyis kyang rin po che mang po de snyed thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-4: de'i tshe na ngas blon po rnams la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-5: rin po che 'di dag ga las byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-7: klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis gter dag bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-8: 'jig rten du gter dag byung bas rin po che rnams kyang byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-9: lha'i zhal sngar slong mo pa ji tsam mchis pa de tsam nyi tshe las ma bstan lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-10: de'i tshe ngas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-11: gal te bdag snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-13: rtsod pa bdo bar gyur pa'i 'jig rten du skye dgu tshe lo brgya pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta na de'i phyir bdag gi re ba 'di'ang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-14: bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gter ston par byed pa'i klu'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:446b-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam rgyal sgra dbyangs 'di'i gling thams cad kyi gling re rer yang skye ba lan bdun bdun len par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-0: skye ba re rer zhing yang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i gter bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag @447a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-1: ston cing gtong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-6: rin po che mthon ka chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-8: chu 'dang gi bar dag gi gter re re zhing yang rgyar dpag tshad stong yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-9: rin po che mang pos yongs su gang ba dag byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-10: sems can rnams la ston cing gtong bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-11: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dpa' bo'i mthu de lta bu dag byed par 'gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i gling thams cad du'ang sngar ji skad smos pa'i bar dag lta bur skye ba lan bdun bdun 'dzin par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-13: gang gi tshe ngas smon lam de lta bu btab pa de'i tshe nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis bar snang las me tog gi char rab tu phab cing nga la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-14: thams cad sbyin pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447a-15: legs so; ;ji ltar khyod kyis smon lam btab pa de bzhin du khyod kyi re ba de'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-0: lha rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil nas rgyal po nam mkha'i @447b ming thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar btags pa skye bo phal po che rnams kyis thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-1: thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-2: bdag cag gis 'di la gang yongs su gtang bar dka' ba'i sbyin pa dag bslang bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-3: gal te yongs su gtong bar byed na ni de'i tshe 'di'i ming thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-4: ji ste yongs su gtong bar mi byed na ni 'di'i ming thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-5: de nas sems can de dag gis rgyal po nam mkha' la slas rnams kyang bslangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-9: bu mo dag kyang bslang bar brtsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-10: de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' sems rab tu dang bas byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-11: de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-12: btsun mo yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni 'di la dka' ba ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-13: bdag cag gis rgyal po nam mkha' la yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-14: nying lag gang yin pa dag bslang bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-15: gal te ster na ni thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-16: ji ste mi ster na ni thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:447b-17: de nas bram ze skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba de rgyal po nam mkha'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-2: rgyal srid bdag la stsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-3: rgyal po nam mkha' de thos pa dang yid mchog tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-4: bdag nyid kyis bram ze khrus byas nas rgyal thabs kyi thod bcings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-5: rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-6: rgyal srid la rab tu bzhag ste dzambu'i gling thams cad phul nas smon lam btab pa; bdag gis dzambu'i gling thams cad yongs su btang bas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-7: gal te bdag gi re ba de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-8: gang bdag gis da ltar dzambu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal por bcug pa 'di dzambu'i gling thams cad du tshig gis dbang sgyur zhing tshe ring ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-9: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-10: gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe rgyal tshab nyid du gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448a-12: bram ze 'dod pa zhes bya ba des kyang nga'i rkang pa gnyis bslangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-0: nga nyid kyis sems rab tu dang bas mtshon cha rnon po blangs @448b nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-1: rang gi rkang pa gnyis bcad de byin nas bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rkang pa thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-2: de na bram ze lta ba bsrung zhes bya ba des kyang nga'i mig gnyis bslangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-3: ngas mig gnyis phyung ste de la byin nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-4: bla na med pa'i spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-5: yang ring po ma lon par bram ze sgra bzang zhes bya ba des kyang nga'i rna ba gnyis bslangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-6: nga nyid kyis rang gi rna ba gnyis bcad de; de la byin nas bla na med pa'i snyan thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-7: 'tsho ba pa yang dag 'tsho zhes bya ba des kyang nga'i skyes bu'i dbang po pho mtshan bslangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-9: byin nas 'doms kyi sba ba'i mtshan bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-10: gzhan dag gis kyang nga'i sha dang khrag dang bslangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-11: nga nyid kyis byin nas gser gyi mdog lta bu'i mtshan thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:448b-12: gzhan yang kun tu rgyu'o ma 'dzag ces bya ba des nga'i lag pa gnyis bslangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-0: nga nyid kyis lag pa g-yas pas lag pa g-yon pa bcad nas g-yas pa'ang gcod du bcug ste byin nas dad pa'i phyag bla na @449a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-1: med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-2: gang gi tshe ngas yan lag dang nying lag dag bcad pa de'i tshe lus khrag gis yog bzhin du smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-3: gal te yongs su gtong ba 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na bdag gi lus kyi len pa zhig kyang gdon mi za bar rnyed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-4: de na sems can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-5: khams kyi rgyal po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-6: blon po de dag kyang snying rje med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-8: byas pa mi gzo bas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-9: 'di ni blo 'chal cing shes pa chung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-10: yan lag thams cad gtubs shing rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad nyams pa yin pas na da sha sna gu 'di ci dgos zhes zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-11: de dag gis nga khyer nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol dur khrod kyi sar bor te dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-13: sbrang bu ma chu ring dag lhags nas khrag 'jib par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-16: bya rgod dag kyang lhags te sha 'thog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-17: de nas ngas sems rab tu dang bas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449a-18: gang gi tshe bdag gis rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad yongs su btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-0: lus dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su btang ba na skad @449b cig gcig tsam yang bdag gis sems 'gyod par ma gyur cing khro ba ma skyes pa lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-1: de'i phyir bdag gi re ba 'di yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-2: bdag gi lus 'di sha'i rir kun tu gnas par gyur la sems can gang su dag sha za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-3: khrag 'thung ba de dag bdag gi sha za bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-5: ji srid du sems can rnams sha za bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-6: khrag 'thung bar 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gi smon lam gyi dbang gis lus mthar gyis skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-7: lus kyi 'phang du ni dpag tshad 'bum yod par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-8: khyon du ni dpag tshad lnga stong yod par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-9: der ngas lo stong gi bar du rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-10: der ngas lce ji snyed yongs su btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-11: gcan gzan dang bya dag gis yongs su zos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-12: yang smon lam gyi dbang gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-13: gzhan dang gzhan dag phyir skyes par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag gi phung po'ang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di'i tshad tsam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-14: ljags shin tu ring pa'i mtshan bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ngas smon lam yang rtag tu btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:449b-15: de nas nga shi 'phos nas smon lam gyi dbang gis dzambu'i gling shing pa ta skye bar klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-0: klu'i rgyal po gter ston ces bya @450a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-2: gang gi nub mo klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de nyid kyi nub mo ngas der gter bye ba khrag khrig phag 'bum kun tu bstan nas nga nyid kyis sgra bsgrags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-7: chu 'dang gi bar gyi rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i gter dag yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-10: blangs nas kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par gzung zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-14: sangs rgyas kyi theg par yang sems skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-15: de nga las rin po che ji tsam dgos pa dag long zhig ces kyang bsgo ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-16: dzambu'i gling shing pa ta skye ba der sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis klu'i skye ba lan bdun brjes pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-17: lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du gter dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bstan cing rab tu byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450a-18: de bzhin du der sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la btsud cing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rab tu bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450b-0: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag @450b gis tshim par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450b-1: bla na med pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam yang btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450b-2: de bzhin du gling gnyis par yang klu'i skye ba lan bdun brjes te skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450b-3: de bzhin du gling gsum pa nas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam rgyal sgra dbyangs thams cad kyi gling kun gyi bar du'ang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450b-4: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi gling re rer yang sngar ji skad smos pa'i bar bzhin du ngas klu'i skye ba de lta bu lan bdun bdun blangs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450b-5: lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun bdun du sems can rnams la gter dpag tu med grangs med pa de lta bu dag bstan cing rab tu byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450b-7: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa stobs dang brtson 'grus shin tu drag pos mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su tshol ba na byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450b-8: sngar ji skad smos pa'i skyes bu dam pa brgyad po de dag ma gtogs par sngon byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang stobs dang brtson 'grus shin tu drag po de lta bus byang chub kyi spyad pa ma spyad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:450b-9: da ltar yang su'ang mi spyod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-1: 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi shugs de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par mi 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-2: de'i tshe bskal pa grangs med pa 'das nas dus ngan pa'i tshe bskal pa chen po autpa la zhes bya ba byung ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di byu ru 'byung ba zhes bya ba stong zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-3: gling bzhi pa der nga brgya byin legs par rnam par byed ces bya bar gyur nas ngas dzambu'i gling de na sems can rnams mi dge ba la dad cing spyod par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-4: mthong nas kyang ngas bdag nyid gnod sbyin gyi gzugs shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta zhig tu mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-5: dzambu'i gling du babs nas mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-6: de dag gis nga mthong nas skrag ste nga la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-8: bdag cag gis khyod la dbul bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-10: kho bo la kha bas dag dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-12: khyod kyi kha zas ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-14: kho bo ni mi dag bsad cing za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451a-15: mi gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-0: log par lta ba'i bar dag @451b spong bar byed pa de dag la ni nga mi za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-1: gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-3: nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed par byed pa de dag la'ang nga mi za'o zhes smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-4: de na nga sems can dag sprul zhing za ba de mthong ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-5: sems can de dag 'jigs pas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-6: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-7: log par lta ba'i bar dag kyang spangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-8: kha cig ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-9: kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-10: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-11: gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-12: theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod nas der ngas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-13: gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:451b-14: de'i phyir bdag gis smon lam 'di'ang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-0: ji ltar bdag gis gling bzhi pa'i sems can rnams dge ba'i lam rnams la nges par sbyar ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun gyi sems can thams cad kyis kyang de lta @452a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-1: bu'i 'jigs pas bdag mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-2: bdag gis kyang sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-3: theg pa gsum po dag la'ang nges par sbyor bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-4: de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag gi sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-5: theg pa gsum po dag la'ang nges par sbyor bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-7: nga'i re ba dang smon lam de bzhin du yongs su rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams byu ru 'byung ba thams cad kyi sems can rnams gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis dge ba'i chos rnams la nges par btul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-9: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu'ang ngas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis mi rnams dge ba'i lam gyi spyod pa dag la rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452a-10: de ltar ngas sems can mang po dag bsdigs shing dge ba'i spyod pa la rab tu bkod pa'i las kyi 'phro des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-0: de bar nga byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod nas byang chub kyi snying por byang chub kyi shing drung @452b du rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug pa na bdud sdig can dmag gi tshogs chen po dang bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-1: nga byang chub las rnam par bzlog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'ongs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-2: rigs kyi bu; ngas byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa mdor bsdus pa ni de yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-3: de'i tshe ngas bzod pa zab mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-6: 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga'ang thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-7: skyes bu'i rtsal chen po de lta bu dag byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-8: de bzhin du sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-9: de bzhin du sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-10: de bzhin du sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag nyan thos kyi theg pa'ang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:452b-11: ngas ji srid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la bsnyen bkur byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-0: ngas sangs rgyas re re'i drung nas rgya mtsho'i chu'i thigs pa snyed kyi yon tan dag yongs su bzung ba ma gtogs par ngas @453a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-1: rang sangs rgyas bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la'ang mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la'ang mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-5: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams la'ang mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-6: ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na snying brtse bas rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-7: da ltar yang rang gi chos rnams kyis tshim par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-8: theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje padma dkar po las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-9: sbyin pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-11: ji ltar ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gzigs pa de dag kyang ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453a-12: de ltar ngas dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453b-0: de bzhin @453b dud ltar shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa dag gzigs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453b-1: ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi bar la'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453b-7: steng gi phyogs rnams su'ang brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453b-9: ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa gzigs te; bcom ldan 'das de'ang ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453b-10: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:453b-11: ngas dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par @454a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-2: de bzhin du sbyar te shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dzambu'i chu klung zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dga' ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dbang phyug sgra dbyang 'od zer zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi ma gnas pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyi ma zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba'i gnas rab ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'tsho zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje grags pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rdul med ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa stag gi 'od zer ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dga' med ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi gdugs snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'khon sbyong 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing lhun po 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-0: sangs rgyas @454b kyi zhing nam mkha' zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa snang dpal snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal tog ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde mchog ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun dbyangs lhun po yang dag ston ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzugs zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med spyan zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-6: de dag la sogs pa shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa dag kyang ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-7: de dag sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa las ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-8: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:454b-10: ngas dang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes bdag gi thad du phul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-0: der de dag thams cad kyis dang po bla na med pa yang @455a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-1: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-2: de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po bzhugs pa de'i gdan rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-3: de byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po de'i gdan rab tu g-yos pa mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-6: sngon ma mthong ba bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rab tu g-yos pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa des de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum 'das pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de da ltar 'khor bzhi po rnams la sngon gyi tshul las brtsams te chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa' gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-0: des nga dang po @455b bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-1: gang gis nga dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa des nga dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa na spyod pa na des nga dang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag gi thad du phul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-4: der ngas dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-5: nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-6: de 'khor bzhi po rnams la sngon gyi tshul de nyid las brtsams te chos ston pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byin gyi rlabs des nga'i stan rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-9: khyed cag las nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la snyun mi mnga' ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:455b-10: thugs bde ba'am zhes yongs su dri ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'gro bar spro ba su yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456a-1: pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa gang dag deng snga dro'i dus kyi tshe snang ba chen po mthong nas rnam par 'phrul pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa 'dir lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456a-4: des dogs 'di yang yud tsam zhig bskyod cing me tog gi char yang rab tu phab pa de dag lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456a-7: bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de la phyag bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'ang mnyan pa'i slang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der mchi'o zhes gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag mang po de dag rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456a-11: de dag gis gang logs su bgrod bar bya ba ma rtsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456b-0: @456b yang de dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456b-2: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed gang pha rol na mchis pa'i phyogs de'ang ma 'tshal lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des phyag brkyang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456b-4: sor mo lnga las 'od zer sna tshogs dag rab tu bkye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456b-5: de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum dag snang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i bar du'ang snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456b-7: des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab cing nam mkha'i ngos kyang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456b-10: lha ma yin dag gis khyab par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:456b-11: mthong nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-0: bdag cag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab ste de na gang du byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang ma mchis @457a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-2: bam po bco lnga pa ste tha ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'ang bdag cag la gzigs shing chos ston par mthong lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ni kun tu gzigs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na sems can gang sa la gnas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-9: bar snang la gnas pa de dag las sems can re re'ang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ni thugs thams cad kyis bdag la gzigs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-11: bdag gcig pu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs gcig gis kyang kha dog dang dbyibs thams cad du chos ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa tshangs par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing tshangs pa'i bdag po chen po'i sgra skad kyis chos thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457a-16: gang dag bdud la dad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-0: gang @457b dag nyi ma la dad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-1: gang dag zla ba la dad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-2: gang dag rnam thos kyi bu la dad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-3: gang dag 'phags skyes po la dad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-4: gang dag mig mi bzang la dad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-5: gang dag yul 'khor srung la dad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-6: gang dag dbang phyug chen po la dad pa'i bar gyi sems can de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa dbang phyug chen po'i bar gyi gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-9: dbang phyug chen po'i tshig dang sgra skad kyis chos thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-14: sgra skad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de bzhin du mthong zhing chos kyang thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal pos 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba bsgrags zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-16: byang chub sems dpa' gcig shos snang ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-17: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:457b-19: khyed 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du deng la nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la snyun mi mnga'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-1: reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-4: thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang nam mkhar bcas pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab par yang dag par rjes su mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-5: de na sa dang nam mkha' la sems can 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang ma mchis na bdag cag gang du gnas par bgyi lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis go skabs yangs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-13: sngon gyi smon lam gyis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang; theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pa las brtsams te chos ston par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-14: bslab pa gsum gyi sdom pa ston par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-15: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag ston par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458a-16: sems can rnams ngan song gsum po dag las 'dren par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458b-0: zhi ba'i lam gsum po dag la rab tu 'god @458b par mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thugs rje dang bstan pa la 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa'i dus shig na 'dul ba'i sems can la gzigs shing ri brag mi mnyam pa'i dbus na gnod sbyin dbang po mig ces bya ba'i gnas shing s'a la'i phug na rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458b-3: bde ba nyams su myong zhing skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun las 'da' bar mdzad cing bzhugs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus s'a la'i phug thams cad khyab par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458b-4: de na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na sor bzhi tsam gyi gtos kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458b-5: zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458b-6: phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la phyag bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:458b-8: chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi ri gang yin pa de logs su mngon du phyogs te 'khod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des 'khor der rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas @459a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-1: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis po de dag gis s'a la'i phug go skabs yangs par mthong zhing der zhugs par gyur pa de ltar s'a la'i phug de yangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-2: de ltar rgya che bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-3: der byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-4: der byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi khri stan dag mngon par sprul nas de la 'khod de chos nyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa las chos mnyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i zhabs la lan gsum mgo bos phyag byas nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag deng nas ring po ma lon par s'a la'i phug de'ang sngon ji lta ba bzhin du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni de ltar go skabs yangs pa yin no;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459a-10: gling bzhi pa de na brgya byin koo shi ka zhes bya ba tshe yongs su zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-0: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bas 'jigs zhing skrag nas de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu @459b brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig 'grogs te s'a la'i phug ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-1: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-2: gnod sbyin dbang po mig gi gnas s'a la'i phug gi kho ra khor yug tu 'khod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-4: gang bdag gis dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la gsol ba btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-5: dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa des dbyangs snyan pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bstod na ni de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-7: ting nge 'dzin dag las bzhengs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-8: de nas brgya byin koo shi kas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la gsol ba btab po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas pi wang blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-10: glu dang rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ongs bas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa lnga brgyas bsngags pa brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-12: gang gi tshe dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa brtsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:459b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de dbyangs snyan rnam par snang byed tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;ting nge 'dzin des 'jig rten gyi khams mi ma [?] [?] na gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-5: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-6: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad der 'dus par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-7: gang dag dbyangs la dad pa de dag gis ni dbyangs thos nas rab tu dang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-8: gang dag bsngags pa dang snyan pa la dga' ba de dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa thos nas bcom ldan 'das de la shin tu dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-10: bla mar bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-11: gus pa skyes te rab tu dang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-12: gang dag gling bu'i sgra la dga' ba de dag gis gling bu'i sgra thos nas rab tu dang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te s'a la'i phug gi sgor gzigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-14: brgya byin nye bar song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-17: bdag gang du mchis par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460a-19: [?] [?] dag ji snyed lhags pa rnams 'khod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-0: de nas s'a la'i phug der ji ltar gnod sbyin gang+g'a'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag zhugs te 'khod pa de ltar s'a la' [?] de rgya che ba 'gyur nas bcom ldan 'das @460b [?] [?] pa des 'khor de dag la 'di ltar chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-1: ji ltar 'khor de na gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa bdag 'khod pa de dag gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam thos shing de dag las dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-2: bye ba phrag dgus rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-3: 'khor de na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' bzhig thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-4: de na dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs pa khrag khrig phrag bco brgyad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-5: gang dag gis theg pa gsum po dag tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag las kha cig gis ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-6: de dag las kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-7: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-8: der brgya byin koo shi ka de'ang 'jigs pa las yongs su grol zhing tshe lo stong du nur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:460b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni de lta de ltar go skabs yangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461a-1: gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yang 'di ltar rgya che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung ba'am bgrang bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'ang rgya che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'ang rgya che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461a-7: de'i spyi gtsug blta ba'am sku'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461a-8: gal te de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i khong du zhugs par gyur cing de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461a-9: sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa da'i spu'i sgo gcig tu zhugs shing 'byung bar gyur kyang de dag gis cher na lha'i mig gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i sgo gcig gi mtha' yang bri ba'am gang bar tshad gzung bar mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de'i sku ni de ltar rgya che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461b-0: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub @461b pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461b-1: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed po ji snyed pa dag 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461b-3: da ltar nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed bzhin du sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du zhugs par gyur kyang de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa na smon lam de lta bu btab pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed dag lta zhog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461b-9: gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed po de ltar rgya che ba dag 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:461b-11: da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed bzhin du sems can rnams kyi yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du zhugs par gyur kyang de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon dang po sems bskyed pa na bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam de lta bu btab pas na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni @462a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni ji skad smos pa'i chos bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-4: khyod kyis me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag long la nub phyogs logs su rang rang gis ji ltar mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-5: nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la snyun mi mnga'am thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' gsang bsgrags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-7: byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i 'od zer la byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-9: nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-10: de na srog chags nyi khris kyang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-12: bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462a-14: bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462b-0: de bzhin @462b gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462b-2: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' gsang bsgrags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462b-4: snang ba'i 'od zer de gnyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan cig 'grogs te 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462b-5: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin te bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la so sor 'khod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462b-6: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462b-8: 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bgyi ba mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:462b-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa sgrogs shing 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho @463a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-3: des nga thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-4: de'i tshig gis ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa des nga dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzhag pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni chos bzhi po de dag gis khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag de skad du gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-7: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mang'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-8: thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-9: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i gdan yang g-yos shing byang chub sems dpa' gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i gdan g-yos par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463a-10: yongs su zhus pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463b-0: ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar de @463b dag thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463b-1: de'i tshe na shar phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la yongs su zhu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463b-5: chos mnyan pa'i phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsgrags pa dag mthar phyin ma thag tu'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis lho phyogs logs kyi yongs su bsgrags pa brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:463b-9: ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-0: bcom ldan 'das de'ang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas ji skad sngar smon pa'i bar @464a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-2: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dzambu'i 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug rnam sgrogs zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing lhun po rab gnas zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug s'a la'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan dbang po'i ba gam zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sengge bsgyings pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu gzhir bkod ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bus rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od 'gyed yang dag bsags zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsgyings pa yang dag bsags zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing lha'i zla ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsandan gyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar chog grags pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri mchog ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs s'a la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rtog pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtsod med ces bya @464b bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i thig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zla bsgrags zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen khyu mchog ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rin chen ngos zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen ljon shing 'bras bu dpag med rin po che zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos sprin sgra dbyangs dbang phyug zla ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464b-5: de bzhin du lho phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi gdan dag g-yos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i bsngags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464b-8: grags pa brjod par mdzad pa da de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa'i dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la yongs su zhu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:464b-9: chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags pa'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin @465a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-2: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-4: ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing blo gros nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-6: de'ang nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing spyad pa spyod pa na ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mkhyen mdzod ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-13: sku mchog rnam par gnon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-14: chos kyi shugs kyi sgron ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-15: lhun po phrag med pa sgra dbyangs rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465a-16: tshangs pa'i dbang po dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-0: de bzhin du nub phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa gang dag gi @465b mtshan dag de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas yongs su bsgrags pa de dag gi gdan dag g-yos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-1: de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas sangs rgyas kyi pho nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags shing 'khod pa'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-3: de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-6: de bzhin du shar lho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-7: de bzhin du lho nub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-8: de bzhin du nub byang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-9: de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs rnams su'ang snga ma bzhin du sbyar te brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-10: yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-12: ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu s'a la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:465b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @466a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-3: thams cad kyi dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag gi thad du phul nas der dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-4: gang gi tshe de'i mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa de'i tshe gdan g-yos pa nas kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-8: sgra skad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de bzhin du mthong zhing chos kyang thos so zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-9: 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig 'khrugs med rtse mo zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-10: gcig shos ni sangs rgyas yang dag 'dod ces bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu snga la'i rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-13: khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du de nga la nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la snyun mi mnga'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466a-14: thugs 'dod bde ba 'jog pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-2: bdag cag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa dang nam mkha' thams cad yang dag par rjes su mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-3: de na sa dang nam mkha' la sems can 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-4: bdag cag gang du gnas par bgyi lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na go skabs med do zhes de skad ma zer cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis go skabs yangs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-11: sngon gyi smon lam gyis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-12: theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pa las brtsams te chos ston par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-13: bslab pa gsum gyi sdom pa ston par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-14: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag ston par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-15: sems can rnams ngan song gsum po dag las 'dren par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-16: zhi ba'i lam gsum po dag la rab tu 'god par mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thugs rje dang bstan pa la 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:466b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa'i dus shig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467a-1: can la gzigs shing ri brag mi mnyam pa'i dbus na gnod sbyin dbang po'i mi gces bya ba'i gnas shing s'a la'i phug na rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467a-2: bde ba nyams su myong zhing skyil mo krung gcig gi zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad cing bzhugs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus s'a la'i phug thams cad khyab par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467a-3: de na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na sor bzhi tsam gyi gtos kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467a-4: zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467a-5: phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la phyag bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467a-7: chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi ri de gang yin pa de logs su mngon du phyogs te 'khod pa dang zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni ji skad smros pa'i chos bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467a-9: khyed kyis me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag long la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-0: lho nub kyi phyogs logs su rang rang gis ji ltar mthong ba'i sangs @467b rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-1: nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la snyun mi mnga'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-2: thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu s'a la'i rgyal po des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug med rtse mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yang dag 'dod la byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-7: nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-8: de na srog chags nyi khris kyang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-10: bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-12: bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-15: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:467b-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan cig 'grogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba de nas 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-0: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi @468a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-1: zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin te bya rgod phung po'i ri la so sor 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-2: 'khod nas kyang de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-4: 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs logs su zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-5: bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-6: thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-7: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'joms pa'i gdan yang g-yos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-8: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'joms pa'i gdan g-yos pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa de la yongs su zhus pa nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-10: de bzhin du de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468a-11: rnam par gnon pa chen po'i 'od zer dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468b-0: rnam par gnon pa'i ye @468b shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468b-1: byang shar gyi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i bar dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la yongs su zhu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468b-5: chos mnyan pa'i phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468b-6: de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyi sems can re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mi jed thams cad de lta bu'i sems can dag gis kyang khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sa dang nam mkha' thams cad sems can de dag gis khyab par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468b-8: gang du sems can dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa go skabs ni tha na mig sman gyi thur ma gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468b-9: sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa mthong ba ma gtogs par nam mkha' stong pa mthong du zad kyi gcig gis gcig ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:468b-10: de dag gi mig gi lam du ri rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-0: ri rnams kyang snang bar ma @469a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-2: 'jig rten gyi bar dag kyang mi snang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-3: lha'i gzhal med khang rnams kyang mi snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-4: 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo la thug pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-5: de'i steng gi sa gzhi'ang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' khyab chos sel shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-7: des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i sgo thams cad du zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-8: gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi khongs su chud par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-9: sems can de dag gi sems las byung ba dag kyang gzugs la kun tu lta ba'i yid la byed pa dang bral zhing de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i sgo 'das [?] zhig tu nges par rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-12: 'jig rten gyi khyams bde ba can gyi skyed mos tshal lta bur rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-15: 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i skyed mos tshal dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469a-16: shing ljon pa bcos bu sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-0: mu tig gi chun po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de @469b dag mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-1: sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-2: bdag cag skyed mos tshal de ltar 'dong ngo snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-3: gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi khongs su chud par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-5: dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-6: gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams ma gtogs par sems can lhag ma thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i sgo dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du zhugs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag slar bsdus te bzhengs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-8: de nas sems can de dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la bzhugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-10: byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-12: bdag cag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs par shes bzhin gyis soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:469b-13: de nas sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyi nang bcas par mthong zhing ji ltar bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs te 'dug par gyur pa rang rang gi mngon sum du gyur nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-0: bdag cag gang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs @470a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la sgras mngon par go bar byas te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-4: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-5: rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-6: gang gi phyir bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa'i ston pas chos ston par mdzad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-7: de'i phyir khyed cag sems can thams cad kyis soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-8: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar ba btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-10: de la bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-13: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-14: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang byung gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-16: de la bsam gtan la gzud pa'i sems bskyed pa yongs su bsngo ba rnam pa bcu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470a-18: phan pa'i dngos po yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems kyis gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-0: sems can ma brgal ba'i brnams bsgral ba'i phyir gru chen @470b pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-1: yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir ma grol ba dgral ba'i go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-2: chos la bdag med par so sor brtag pa'i phyir seng+ge'i sgra chen pos mi sgra pa'i go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-3: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-5: mi g-yor lta bur rtogs pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-6: tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa la gnas pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas brgyan par byed pa'i go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-7: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su sgrub pa'i go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-8: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa'i go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ji ltar thos pa'i chos bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ma lus par thob pa'i go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-11: de dag ni bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad la gzud pa rnam pa bcu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-12: mtshan nyid med pa'i sgo yongs su shes pa rtogs pa'i spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-13: chos thams cad bdag med par yid la byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:470b-14: sems skyes ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-0: 'gag pa med par rtogs pa gang yin pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa @471a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-3: ldog pa chad cing rtag pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-5: gzhag pa med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-6: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs pa'i sems can gangg'a'i klung dud phyur phrag brgyad kyi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-7: der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed po de dag gis ni gzungs dang bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs thob par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-8: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spu'i sgo dag nas phyir thon pa dang ngo mtshar du gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-11: sku'i tshad brtag pa'i phyir phyogs bcur rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-12: de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shar phyogs logs su dong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-13: shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni nyams pa med cing der yang tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471a-15: yig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra dag de bzhin du thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-0: @471b ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i spyan snga na 'dug pa'i chos thos pa de bzhin du de'i chos thos so //
