K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-1: gzhan yang de na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i sku'ang skye ba'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dag gis khyab par snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i spu'i sgo gcig na'ang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-3: nyan thos dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'jug cing 'byung bar snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-4: de bzhin du spu'i sgo gnyis pa nas spu'i sgo thams cad kyi bar dag tu'ang 'jug cing 'byung bar snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-5: phyogs bcu'i bar du'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-6: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i khong par zhugs par gyur pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i spu'i sgo dag nas phyir 'thon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-7: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-12: brjod pa sna tshogs dag gis bstod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-13: de nas de'i mod la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-14: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis spos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:471b-16: byug pa sna tshogs kyi char dag rab tu phab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-0: @472a *// lha'i sil snyan dag kyang rab tu gsil nas lha'i gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-5: rgyan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-6: de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med yang dag 'dren ces bya ba des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-8: lung bstan pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-11: sangs rgyas mang po pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-12: mang po 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-13: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-14: mi 'jigs pa'i lam du sgrol ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi rtog pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-17: rgya mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-18: bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-19: snying rje padma dkar po zhes kyang bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472a-23: rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-1: gzhan dag la'ang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-3: ngas de'i bsod nams sngar yang smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-4: de yang mdor bsdus te brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-5: gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-9: gzhan dag la'ang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-10: gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma na tha na bris te 'chang bar byed na de bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-11: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bskal pa chen po chen bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-15: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-16: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-24: lha ma yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sdang ba'i sems rab tu dang bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:472b-25: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-1: bar zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-2: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-3: dus ma yin pa'i char pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-5: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-6: mu ge thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-8: lo legs par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-9: nad med pa tshogs par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-10: skrag pa rnams 'jigs pa med pa cing bde bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-11: nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-13: ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-14: theg pa gsum po dag gi lam yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-17: bzod pa thob par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-18: sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-19: rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-20: bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-21: byang chub kyi phyogs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-22: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-23: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-25: mi 'jigs pa'i grong khyer gyi gnas su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473a-26: ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i lag tu gtad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-0: su zhig lnga brgya tha ma la nga'i @473b chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-1: chos ma yin pa lhur len pa'i sems can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-2: tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong rnams kyi rna lam du sgrogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-3: chos ma yin pa la chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-4: 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-5: chos log pas yongs su dkris pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-6: sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams kun tu skyo ba med par 'gyur zhig gu snyam du dgongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-7: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas 'khor de na gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po zhes bya ba zhig kyang 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po de khrid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-10: drang srong chen po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-11: lnga brgya pa tha ma la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan du song ba'i bar dag gi rna lam du sgrogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:473b-12: de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed du chug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-0: bdag smon lam gyis bskal ba chen po brgyad cu rtsa @474a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-1: bzhi 'das pa nas gnod sbyin gyi drang srong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-2: bdag gis sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag la rab tu bkod cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la'ang rab tu bkod lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-3: bdag gis sems can gang dag lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-4: gang dag 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam gyi bar dag 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag kyang bdag nyid kyis yongs su smin par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-6: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-9: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-11: 'phags pa snying rje padma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-12: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-052-003:474a-15: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
